43.SummaryEnglish: Brook hears Big Mom's plan firsthand as she shares her intentions with Pudding in front of him! Meanwhile Big Mom's agents believe most of the Straw Hats to be under control, but doubt besets Mortd'Or.
43.TitleJapanese: 別れの決意！サンジと麦わら弁当
43.SummaryJapanese: 恩人と仲間の命、家族への捨てきれぬ情、生と死を賭けた選択に悩むサンジ。空腹で身動きすらやっとのルフィは追手達と戦いサンジとの約束の場所を目指していた!

44.TitleEnglish: The Emperor Rolls Over! Rescue Brook Mission!
44.SummaryEnglish: Nami and the others finally find Brook in the mirror dimension - but he's in the most inopportune of places! Can they challenge the sleeping Mama and rescue their friend? Meanwhile, Luffy is waylaid on his way back to the rendezvous!
44.TitleJapanese: 四皇の寝返りブルック救出大作戦
44.SummaryJapanese: ブルックを救出すべくビッグ・マムの寝室へ侵入したナミ達だが眠りこんだマムを起こさず奪い返そうとして失敗を繰り返していた。無事救出することはできるか！？

45.TitleEnglish: The Rendezvous! Luffy, a One-on-One at His Limit!
45.SummaryEnglish: Luffy puts up a valiant fight in order to keep his word to Sanji! But will he be able to last until Sanji arrives at the rendezvous? Meanwhile, Jimbei shares the awful truth about the wedding with the other Straw Hats.
45.TitleJapanese: 約束の場所 ルフィ限界の一騎打ち
45.SummaryJapanese: 決死の救出作戦で戻ってきたブルック。ボロボロになりながらも前へ進むルフィ。ガレキの中ルフィを捜し回るサンジ。それぞれの思いを胸に約束の場所を目指す！！

46.SummaryEnglish: Sanji and Luffy meet finally - and while he is happy to feed Luffy to replenish his energy, Sanji's explanation of what actions he must take baffles Luffy! The crucial decision to turn his back on his friends or his family, tears Sanji apart!
46.TitleJapanese: ウソつき…ルフィとサンジ
46.SummaryJapanese: 決別した場所で再会したルフィとサンジ。ルフィは皆の所に戻ってこいと説得するが帰れない理由を明かすサンジ。サンジは本心を言えと迫られ本当の胸の内を明かす。

47.TitleEnglish: Sanji Comes Back! Crash! The Tea Party from Hell!
47.SummaryEnglish: The newly reunited Luffy and Sanji hear from the rest of the Straw Hats in the mirror dimension! Then, Jimbei starts telling them about Capone "Gang" Bege and proposes a shocking plan to take down Big Mom!
47.TitleJapanese: サンジ復活 壊せ！地獄のお茶会
47.SummaryJapanese: サンジが麦わらの一味に戻ってきた！ナミ達と結婚式をぶち壊してサンジ家を助ける事を告げるルフィ。だがジンベエはビッグ・マムを巡るもう一つの陰謀を語る!!

48.TitleEnglish: A Secret Meeting! Luffy vs. The Fire Tank Pirates!
48.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats put Jimbei's plan into action and approach Bege with the possibility of an alliance. But before they are granted an audience, they must make themselves presentable! At the same time, Nami learns about the terror of Big Mom from Lola's twin sister!
48.TitleJapanese: 密会！ルフィVSファイアタンク海賊団

49.TitleEnglish: The Deadly Pact! Luffy & Bege's Allied Forces
49.SummaryEnglish: The proposed alliance between the Straw Hats and Bege unfolds! A gaseous blast from the past, Gastino, a member of Bege's team, reveals the secret weapon that the team plans to use against the Emperor! But Gastino is not who he seems, and the bait in this trap is none other than Luffy himself!
49.TitleJapanese: 死の協定 ルフィ&ベッジ連合軍

50.TitleEnglish: Luffy Engages in a Secret Maneuver! The Wedding Full of Conspiracies Starts Soon!
50.SummaryEnglish: Now, the assassination plan of Big Mom is all set and everyone starts preparing for the Tea Party. Montd'Or finds one of his crewmates, Bobbin the Disposer, dead, and suspects Sanji and Luffy of the crime. He goes to check if Sanji is in his room, just as Sanji is running to get back so as not to arouse suspicion.
50.TitleJapanese: ルフィ暗躍 開演直前！陰謀の結婚式

51.TitleEnglish: The Family Gets Together! The Hellish Tea Party Starts!
51.SummaryEnglish: The day has arrived! Guests from the criminal underground pour in in droves, but some have their own agendas to settle! Big Mom's sons, however, stand in their way and show them what they've got! Meanwhile, Luffy is preparing for his own plan!
51.TitleJapanese: 家族集結 開演！地獄のお茶会

52.TitleEnglish: The Broken Couple! Sanji and Pudding Enter!
52.SummaryEnglish: Final preparations abound on all sides and multiple plots start to come together! But can Sanji keep his nerve and go through with the plan? Or will Pudding's beauty prove too enchanting?
52.TitleJapanese: 仮面夫婦 サンジ♡プリン入場！

53.TitleEnglish: A Deadly Kiss! The Mission to Assassinate the Emperor Kicks Off!
53.SummaryEnglish: All plans go into action as the moment of the wedding arrives - but as the veil is lifted on Pudding's grotesque face, all hell breaks loose and unexpected circumstances mean chaos breaks out at the altar. Luffy charges in adding to the mayhem!
53.TitleJapanese: 死のキス 四皇暗殺作戦開始!

54.TitleEnglish: Returning the Sake Cup! The Manly Jimbei Pays His Debt!
54.SummaryEnglish: The plan is launched! Big Mom falls to pieces as the wedding - and the wedding cake - are destroyed and a slew of Luffys are wreaking havoc around the site. But just when Luffy gets in trouble, Jimbei confronts Big Mom bravely!
54.TitleJapanese: 盃返上! 侠客ジンベエの落とし前

55.TitleEnglish: The Mission Failed?! The Big Mom Pirates Strike Back!
55.SummaryEnglish: The plan is in full swing however - Big Mom is pushed past the edge of sanity and can't bring herself to act. Meanwhile, her children make a move against Germa and Pudding takes up her original aim of killing Sanji!
55.TitleJapanese: 作戦失敗!? 反撃のビッグ・マム海賊団

56.SummaryEnglish: The plot is full swing as Luffy dashes towards Big Mom to show her the broken portrait again! Sanji makes an effort to free his family and wins the respect of his sister and Big Mom loses her wits!
56.TitleJapanese: 走れサンジ SOS!ジェルマ66

57.TitleEnglish: Mom's Secret! The Giant's Island Elbaph and a Little Monster!
57.SummaryEnglish: The tragic and sad history of Big Mom is revealed! From abandonment, rescue, and again to ruin. Big Mom's voracious hunger has brought her into conflict with others from the very beginning!
57.TitleJapanese: マムの秘密　巨人の島と小さな怪物
57.SummaryJapanese: 幼子のように大粒の涙を流し、マザー・カルメルに訴えかけるビッグ・マム。それは63年前の話。まだ子供だったマム、シャーロット・リンリンは、並み外れた大きな体と力を持っていた。しかし、無邪気にその力をふるった結果、周囲に被害を与えた罪で国外追放となってしまう。そして自分たちの手に負えないと思った両親により、巨人族の戦士たちが暮らす島エルバフへ置き去りにされる。その後、マザーに引き取られ、同じように身よりのない子供たちと暮らすことになり、自分と同じ大きな体を持つ巨人族を初めて目にした。

58.TitleEnglish: The Birth of Mom! The Day That Carmel Vanished!
58.SummaryEnglish: Linlin enrages the Giants as she slays their respected warrior - but Mother throws herself on their mercy and begs for clemency for her beloved Linlin, forcing the troupe to leave Elbaph for good. But the kindness Mother shows belies a dark and twisted secret...
58.TitleJapanese: マム誕生　カルメルが消えた日
58.SummaryJapanese: ヨルルの剣を片手でなぎ払い、ひげを掴んで力任せに地面へ叩きつけるリンリン。しかし、マザーの指示でお祭り用のセムラが届くと、食べることに夢中になっておとなしくなる。火の勢いが強すぎて、見ていることしかできなかった炎を前にしたマザーは、パンドラと名づけて自分に従うよう命令すると、たちまち炎を沈めてしまう。奇跡だとおどろく巨人たち。重傷を負ったヨルルが助からないことを見抜いたヤルルは、仇であるリンリンを討とうとするが、彼女を連れて出ていくというマザーの命乞いをやむなく聞き入れる。

59.TitleEnglish: The Launcher Blasts! The Moment of Big Mom Assassination!
59.SummaryEnglish: Linlin, destroyed at the disappearance of Mother, falls in with a new cohort and finds a reason to go on living, proving herself a mighty force to be reckoned with! The Straw Hats' plan goes awry and all hope looks to be lost!
59.TitleJapanese: 兵器炸裂！ビッグ・マム暗殺の瞬間
59.SummaryJapanese: 突如、姿を消したマザーと羊の家の子供たち。だが、その一部始終は二人の人物に目撃されていた。一人は羊の家の様子を見に来たエルバフの戦士。このことは各地の巨人族たちの間に伝わり、リンリンは忌み嫌われる存在となった。もう一人は島に住みついていた元海賊の料理人シュトロイゼン。あらゆる物を食材に変えてしまうククククの実の能力者で、リンリンを死なせるには惜しいと近づいてきた。そして、マザーはそのうち戻ってくると慰めながら、剣で木や花を食材に変えて空腹のリンリンに巨大なケーキを作ってやる。

60.SummaryEnglish: Bege and the Straw Hats are on the defensive as the full force of Mom's troops are brought down on them! As they retreat into a fortress, Germa 66 springs in to action! However, Bege has bad news for his allied forces.
60.TitleJapanese: 悪の軍団　変身！ジェルマ６６

61.TitleEnglish: Cutting the Father-Son Relationship! Sanji and Judge!
61.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats and Germa 66 are cornered in Bege's stronghold - with the full force of Big Mom Pirates pinning them down, It's only a matter of time before their defenses crack. The only way out seems to be to make a break for it.
61.TitleJapanese: 父子の訣別 サンジとジャッジ

62.TitleEnglish: Escape from the Tea Party! Luffy vs. Big Mom!
62.SummaryEnglish: The plan is executed to sneak the Straw Hats out of Big Mom's castle while hidden inside Bege! But the irascible Luffy can't resist getting in at least one punch against his foe! Meanwhile the Tamate Box slips into the hands of some surprising agent!
62.TitleJapanese: 茶会脱出! ルフィVSビック・マム

63.TitleEnglish: The Execution Begins! Luffy’s Allied Forces Annihilated!?
63.SummaryEnglish: The full might of the Big Mom Pirates proves too much for the Straw Hats and Germa 66. With no other options, they decide to turn and fight, even though it means their total annihilation! But the mysterious Tamate Box comes in to play and shakes up the playing field - literally!
63.TitleJapanese: 処刑開始! ルフィ連合軍全滅!?

64.TitleEnglish: The Castle Collapses! The Straw Hat's Great Escape Begins!
64.SummaryEnglish: The Whole Cake Chateau starts crumbling while everyone is trying to escape for their lives! Luffy and the others get away and move on to the next stage of their escape which involves some parting of ways. Meanwhile, Big Mom's children notice their mother's change of behavior at the worst possible moment.
64.TitleJapanese: 巨城崩壊 麦わら一味大脱走開始

65.TitleEnglish: The Spear of Elbaph!  Onslaught! The Flying Big Mom!
65.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats continue their mad dash to the Sunny! As Big Mom rages, her underlings decide to turn her Hunger Pang attacks against the Straw Hats! The Whole Cake Island scrambles to remake the cake to calm down Big Mom!
65.TitleJapanese: 巨人の槍 強襲!空翔けるビック・マム

66.TitleEnglish: Pudding's Determination! Ablaze! The Seducing Woods
66.SummaryEnglish: Kingbaum puts his life on the line ferrying the Straw Hats towards the Seducing Woods! But Big Mom's word trumps him in this terrifying forest, and soon enough she catches up! Meanwhile, Pudding puts her plan to rebuild the cake into action - and reveals her surprising motivations!
66.TitleJapanese: プリンの決意 大炎上! 誘惑の森

67.TitleEnglish: A Lightning Counterattack! Nami and Zeus the Thundercloud!
67.SummaryEnglish: Zeus pursues the Straw Hats as Nami keeps him occupied. She has a shocking suprise in store for him, however, that might stop Big Mom in her tracks! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper find the Shark Submerge in a strange situation.
67.TitleJapanese: 反撃の雷 ナミと雷雲ゼウス

68.TitleEnglish: A Coincidental Reunion! Sanji and the Lovestruck Evil Pudding
68.SummaryEnglish: Big Mom is relentless in her pursuit of the Straw Hats! Even being buried alive doesn't stop her! The plan to recreate the cake to stop her onslaught progresses and Pudding's changeable heart confuses all those looking on!
68.TitleJapanese: 偶然の再会 サンジと恋する悪プリン

69.TitleEnglish: Save the Sunny! Fighting Bravely! Chopper and Brook!
69.SummaryEnglish: Mama's onslaught continues as Pudding keeps battling the contradictory urges in her head - to kill or kiss Sanji! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper are at Perospero's mercy - and are being reduced to sweetened versions of themselves.
69.TitleJapanese: サニーを守れ 奮戦! チョッパー＆ブルック

70.TitleEnglish: Before the Dawn! Pedro, the Captain of the Guardians
70.SummaryEnglish: Sandwiched between Big Mom and her advancing fleet, the only hope is the Sunny's Coup-de-Burst! But can the Straw Hats prepare it in time? Meanwhile, Pedro comes face to face with his past, and embraces a dramatic end to be sure that the tides of time continue to flow!
70.TitleJapanese: 夜明け前 侠客団団長ペドロ

71.TitleEnglish: I'll Be Back! Luffy, Deadly Departure
71.SummaryEnglish: The last chance the Straw Hats have is the Coup de Burst! Pedro has made the ultimate sacrifice to give them this one chance to escape, but Big Mom's naval forces are closing in and poised to knock them out! Luffy has to put himself on the line again to save his crew!
71.TitleJapanese: 必ず戻る ルフィ命がけの出航!

72.TitleEnglish: The Man with a Bounty of Billion! The Strongest Sweet Commander, Katakuri
72.SummaryEnglish: Nami and the others who escaped the Whole Cake Island by Pedro's Sacrifice mourn over his death. Jimbei, however, keeps his calm which makes Brook lose his temper. Meanwhile, Luffy confronts the formidable Sweet General Katakuri in the Mirroworld.
72.TitleJapanese: 10億の男 最強の3将星カタクリ

73.TitleEnglish: A Hard Battle Starts!  Luffy vs. Katakuri!
73.SummaryEnglish: Pudding and Sanji arrive at Cacao Island and begin to remake the only cake that will calm Big Mom! But their fake nupitals get in ghe way as they bicker like a married couple! Meanwhile, Luffy has lost the bttle of his life - and the flame goes out of him... until the Sunny becomes the target of a new threat!
73.TitleJapanese: 激闘開幕 ルフィVSカタクリ

74.TitleEnglish: The Green Room! An Invincible Helmsman, Jimbei
74.SummaryEnglish: Luffy keeps the forces out to destroy the Straw Hats at bay, however the crew needs to destroy all the mirrors - the final link that secure his safe return - on the ship in order to save themselves! At he same time, the ship is on a course for disaster, with Jibei at the helm!
74.TitleJapanese: 波の部屋 無敵の操舵手ジンベエ

75.TitleEnglish: The Threat of the Mole! Luffy's Silent Fight!
75.SummaryEnglish: Nami and the others start breaking all the mirrors on the Sunny in order to keep their enemies out while she and Luffy discuss where to rendezvous - but little do they know the plan is overheard! Meanwhile, Luffy's grueling battle against Katakuri intensifies!
75.TitleJapanese: 土竜の脅威 ルフィ沈黙の戦い

76.TitleEnglish: The End of Deadly Battle?! Katakuri's Awakening in Anger!
76.SummaryEnglish: Both powerful combatants and strong users of Haki, Luffy and Katakuri are a dead match for each other. Every move is matched by their opponent! Elsewhere, the Big Mom Pirates square off against Germa! With so much at stake, Luffy falls to Katakuri, spelling his doom!
76.TitleJapanese: 死闘決着!? カタクリ怒りの覚醒

77.SummaryEnglish: Katakuri retires to his sanctuary to enjoy the merienda - a chance for him to savor the sweetness of his crew of chefs and replenish his Haki! But he's not the only one who's doing eating, as Straw Hat uses his mouth to get out from under the mochi mountain crushing him!
77.TitleJapanese: 禁断の秘密 カタクリのおやつの時間

78.TitleEnglish: Luffy's Fights Back! The Invincible Katakuri's Weak Point!
78.SummaryEnglish: Luffy discovers the secret to Katakuri's unearthly fighting ability, and just might have a solution for how to stop him! Meanwhile at the Sweets Factory, Pudding receives a call from Brulee who has bad news for the Straw Hats!
78.TitleJapanese: ルフィ反撃 カタクリの弱点!

79.TitleEnglish: Another Crisis! Gear 4 vs. Unstoppable Donuts
79.SummaryEnglish: Luffy runs out of his Haki and has to buy some time - in the most peculiar way! Meanwhile the Big Mom Pirates mobilize their entire fleet to squelch the pirate threat, and the replacement cake nears completion!
79.TitleJapanese: 危機再び! ギア４VS無双ドーナツ

80.TitleEnglish: The Rebellious Daughter, Chiffon! Sanji's Big Plan for Transporting the Cake!
80.SummaryEnglish: When Chiffon comes under attack, Sanji must choose between defending her or revealing himself to his enemies! Meanwhile, Luffy uses Brulee as a human shield to avoid the wrath of Big Mom!
80.TitleJapanese: 反逆の娘 サンジのケーキ輸送大作戦

81.TitleEnglish: A Man's Way of Life! Bege and Luffy's Determination as Captains
81.SummaryEnglish: Bege arrives on the scene, seemingly willing to risk it all to bring down the Big Mom Pirates in a blaze of glory, but of course he has a trick up his sleeve! Meanwhile Luffy keeps on the move to regain his Haki, but begins to ponder just how far his limits can be pushed!
81.TitleJapanese: 男の生き様 ベッジとルフィ船長の決意

82.TitleEnglish: The Cake Sank?! Sanji and Bege's Getaway Battle!
82.SummaryEnglish: Sanji and Bege get together and get off of Cacao Island successfully but their plan is in jeopardy as Oven begins to boil the sea itself! As Chiffon and the others who are on the ship are cornered, a surprising savior comes in to fight Oven!
82.TitleJapanese: ケーキ沈没!? サンジ&ベッジ逃亡戦

83.SummaryEnglish: A vicious pincer attack bears down on the Straw Hats! Three fleets converge and try to squeeze the life from them! Daifuku himself take the lead! But Carrot draws on a deep power within and springs in to action under the light of the moon!
83.TitleJapanese: 月の獅子キャロット 神秘の大変身

84.TitleEnglish: Break Through! Straw Hat Crew's Great Naval Battle!
84.SummaryEnglish: The much anticipated wedding cake is on its way, but there is a debate at the last minute! Shouldn't this opportunity be used to slip poison into Big Mom's meal to topple the Emperor of the Sea? Meanwhile, Carrot's unearthly ability based on the power of the moon saves the day!
84.TitleJapanese: 突破せよ 麦わらの一味大海戦!

85.TitleEnglish: Finally, the Clash! The Emperor of the Sea vs. the Straw Hats!
85.SummaryEnglish: Luffy, through sheer force of will, can almost use his Haki to battle Katakuri! Meanwhile, the Sunny catches fire while the Straw Hats try to kick out Big Mom but that’s when Jimbei steps up to the plate and takes a swing at her!
85.TitleJapanese: 遂に激突 四皇VS麦わらの一味

86.TitleEnglish: Dark King's Direct Precepts! The Battle Against Katakuri Turns Around
86.SummaryEnglish: Luffy tries to enhance his Haki to foresee Katakuri’s next move but Katakuri’s attacks keep pulling him down! However, when he summons every bit of wisdom from his training with Rayleigh, he remembers something important that could turn the tables for him!
86.TitleJapanese: 冥王直伝 カタクリ戦大逆転開始

87.TitleEnglish: He Finally Returns! Sanji, the Man Who Stops the Yonko
87.SummaryEnglish: The cake is finally prepared and brought before Big Mom! With the end of her vicious rampage in sight, there is a chance for the Straw Hats to flee! Big Mom's crew is forced to decide who to attack! Meanwhile, Luffy grows ever closer to using his Haki!
87.TitleJapanese: 遂に帰還 四皇を止める男サンジ

88.TitleEnglish: Lurking in the Darkness! Assassin Attacks Luffy!
88.SummaryEnglish: Hiding her presence, Flampe shoots her blowgun at Luffy to support her dear brother Katakuri. Meanwhile, Oven launches a dastardly plan to fence Luffy in - by destroying every mirror on the island! And Smoothie is on the tail of the Sunny as it makes its way towards Cacao Island!
88.TitleJapanese: 闇に潜む ルフィを襲う暗殺者!

89.TitleEnglish: A Man's Resolution! Katakuri's Life-Risking Great Match
89.SummaryEnglish: Katakuri notices his sister Flampe is sneakily providing poison needle back up in the shadows. Becoming enraged, he takes unexpected action that surprises everyone. Meanwhile, Smoothie increases her size and closes in on the Sunny.
89.TitleJapanese: 男の覚悟 カタクリ命がけ大勝負

90.TitleEnglish: Wake Up! To Cross over the Strongest Kenbunshoku
90.SummaryEnglish: Luffy leans on his training to bring out the power of his Haki! Meanwhile the children of Big Mom gather as a massive force ready to smash Luffy and the Straw Hats. Their resentment at being embarrassed fuels their desire to get revenge!
90.TitleJapanese: 目覚めろ 最強を越える見聞色!

91.TitleEnglish: A God Speed Fist! New Gear 4 Activation!
91.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and Katakuri are locked in a duel to end all duels! Their powers ensure that each blow could be the last! Luffy must rely on his training, let all his thoughts out, and keep pushing on! Meanwhile, Sanji is about to land at Cacao Island!
91.TitleJapanese: 神速の拳 新たなるギア4発動!

92.TitleEnglish: Finally, It's Over! The Climax of the Intense Fight against Katakuri!
92.SummaryEnglish: Luffy's dramatic battle finally draws to a close! But even if he is able to pull out victory in the last moment, can he remember the key to escaping the Mirrorworld?! Meanwhile, the whole host of the Big Mom Pirates watch the lonely mirror to see who will come through!
92.TitleJapanese: 遂に終結 壮絶カタクリ戦の行方

93.TitleEnglish: A Desperate Situation! The Iron-Tight Entrapment of Luffy!
93.SummaryEnglish: Luffy emerges safely! And Pekoms' bravery ensures he and the Straw Hats have a fighting chance! But can they withstand the full force of the Big Mom Pirates? At the last moment - a surprise explodes onto the scene!
93.TitleJapanese: 絶体絶命 鉄壁のルフィ包囲網!

94.TitleEnglish: Pulling Back from the Brink! The Formidable Reinforcements – Germa!
94.SummaryEnglish: Sanji tries his best to save himself and his captain, Luffy! But the arrival of Germa has complicated matters. Whose side do these powerful superhumans fight on? In the end, sisterly love will see Sanji saved!
94.TitleJapanese: 起死回生 最強の援軍ジェルマ!

95.TitleEnglish: The Last Hope! The Sun Pirates Emerge!
95.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and Sanji are safe! But the critical moment approaches - the fate of Totto Land rests on the taste of the wedding cake! Will it be sweet release or bitter defeat? Meanwhile, a cunning pincer attack leaves the Straw Hats hopelessly trapped. Only old, reliable comrades can save the day!
95.TitleJapanese: 最後の砦 タイヨウの海賊団現る

96.TitleEnglish: A Captivating Flavor! Sanji's Cake of Happiness!
96.SummaryEnglish: With the help of the Sun Pirates, the Straw Hats see their chance to escape! And the Sun Pirates bid farewell to their former captain. Mama finally tastes the Wedding Cake and the results are positively scrumptious!
96.TitleJapanese: 魅惑の味 幸せのサンジのケーキ

97.TitleEnglish: The Man of Humanity and Justice! Jinbe, a Desperate Massive Ocean Current
97.SummaryEnglish: The Big Mom Pirates fooled! The Straw Hats have eluded their would-be tormentors with the help of the Sun Pirates! However, as the fleet of the Big Mom Pirates is still coming after them, Jimbei makes a crucial decision to help the Sunny to get away.
97.TitleJapanese: 仁義の漢 ジンベエ決死の大海流

98.TitleEnglish: Time for Farewell! Pudding’s One Last Request!
98.SummaryEnglish: At a great cost of energy and life, the Straw Hats make it out of Totto Land. Left behind in their wake are allies and friends, and would-be lovers. As the sea opens before them, what price has been paid for their escape?
98.TitleJapanese: 惜別の時 プリン最後の“お願い”

1.TitleEnglish: The World in Shock! The Fifth Emperor of the Sea Arrives!
1.SummaryEnglish: Luffy's recent exploits make their way around the world! The reputation of this mighty pirate begins to grow as all eyes look towards the Straw Hats' next move! Also - German 66 leaves an artifact behind which excites the crew!
1.TitleJapanese: 世界驚愕 第五の海の皇帝現る!

2.TitleEnglish: To the Reverie! Gathering of the Straw Hat Allies!
2.SummaryEnglish: As the royals make their way to the Reverie, the mighty Navy takes all precautions to make sure they don't fall prey to kidnappings! At the vanguard is Koby, who glimpses Luffy's exploits and remembers their shared past. Meanwhile, Luffy is confronted with a staggering change to his bounty!
2.TitleJapanese: 世界会議へ 集結！麦わらの盟友達

3.TitleEnglish: Sabo Goes into Action - All the Captains of the Revolutionary Army Appear!
3.SummaryEnglish: A vicious pirate group led by Pinkbeard who describes himself as one of Blackbeard’s affiliates attacks a town in the Kingdom of Lulucia while their king and able-bodied soldiers have gone to the Reverie. And four bizarre individuals come to help. They’re the captains of the Revolutionary Army.
3.TitleJapanese: サボ動く 革命軍全隊長登場!

4.TitleEnglish: The Next Move - New Obsessive Fleet Admiral Sakazuki
4.SummaryEnglish: Sakazuki, the new Fleet Admiral, is in New Marineford. There, he finishes hearing the news about Luffy and remembers the tumultuous events that already happened with him ...
4.TitleJapanese: 動き出す 執念の新元帥サカズキ
4.SummaryJapanese: 新艦隊提督のサカズキはニューマリンフォードにいる。 そこで、彼はルフィについてのニュースを聞き終え、すでに彼と一緒に起こった激動の出来事を思い出す...

5.TitleEnglish: The Summit War - Pirate King's Inherited Will
5.SummaryEnglish: Nobles from all over the world gather for the Daydream ... Shirahoshi sees the surface for the first time! Meanwhile, Fujitora and Ryokugyu have a conversation ...
5.TitleJapanese: 頂上戦争 継がれた海賊王の意思

6.TitleEnglish: One Step Ahead of the Dream - Shirahoshi's Path to the Sun!
6.SummaryEnglish: Stelly, Sabo’s adopted brother and now the king of the Goa Kingdom, walks up to Garp who is escorting the royal family of the Fish-Man Island, with an air of importance and something up his sleeve. Meanwhile, Shirahoshi sees the surface world for the first time.
6.TitleJapanese: 夢の一歩 しらほし太陽の下へ!

7.TitleEnglish: I Miss Him! Vivi and Rebecca's Sentiments!
7.SummaryEnglish: Shirahoshi and her family finally reach the Holyland of Mariejois! But all the unexpected attention confuses her. Meanwhile, Vivi from Alabasta meets Leo and Rebecca from Dressrosa, and tells them the story of her journey with the Straw Hats.
7.TitleJapanese: 会いたい ビビとレベッカの想い

8.TitleEnglish: In the Dark Recesses of the Holyland! A Mysterious Giant Straw Hat!
8.SummaryEnglish: While Vivi, Shirahoshi and Rebecca are in discussion, other ghosts from the straw hat crew's past resurface. Dolton and Kureha face the infamous Wapol!
8.TitleJapanese: 聖地の闇 謎の巨大な麦わら帽子

9.TitleEnglish: The Holyland in Tumult! The Targeted Princess Shirahoshi!
9.SummaryEnglish: Shirahoshi ends up crossing his path with a Celestial Dragon and a big mess is about to begin! What will King Neptune do ?!
9.TitleJapanese: 聖地騒然 狙われたしらほし姫!

10.TitleEnglish: An Explosive Situation! Two Emperors of the Sea Going After Luffy!
10.SummaryEnglish: Big Mom and Kaido decide to unite to go after Luffy ... Garp hears about some of his grandchild's feats ...
10.TitleJapanese: 一触即発 ルフィ狙う二人の四皇

11.TitleEnglish: Sabo Enraged! The Tragedy of the Revolutionary Army Officer Kuma!
11.SummaryEnglish: Sabo, on a mission of recognition in the Holy Land, suddenly falls on a specter arisen from the past of the revolutionary army. Bartholomew Kuma fell into the hands of celestial dragons.
11.TitleJapanese: サボ怒る 革命軍幹部くまの悲劇

12.TitleEnglish: Finally, It Starts! The Conspiracy-Filled Reverie!
12.SummaryEnglish: The Reverie has begun! The representative kings and queens first discuss what to do with Straw Hat Luffy. Meanwhile the Revolutionary Army confirms its desire to save Kuma! All while they recount how the Straw Hats have grown from upstarts into world players!
12.TitleJapanese: 遂に開幕 陰謀渦巻く世界会議!

13.TitleEnglish: Marco! The Keeper of Whitebeard's Last Memento
13.SummaryEnglish: In order to recruit a strong ally towards bringing down Kaido, Cat Viper and his crew stop by Whitebeard’s homeland to see Marco, the 1st division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.
13.TitleJapanese: マルコ! 白ひげの形見の守護者

14.TitleEnglish: Climbing Up a Waterfall! A Great Journey Through the Land of Wano's Sea Zone!
14.SummaryEnglish: After reading about the Levely in the newspaper, Luffy's group finds themselves in the perilous sea surrounding Wano Country, which leads to the bottom of a waterfall. Luffy uses the giant carp swimming around them to pull the crew and ship up the waterfall, but they end up sailing into a whirlpool at the top, causing Luffy to be submerged.
14.TitleJapanese: 滝登り! ワノ国の海域大航海!

1.TitleEnglish: The Land of Wano! To the Samurai Country Where Cherry Blossoms Flutter!
1.SummaryEnglish: A mysterious country, a rampaging slasher, ancient samurai rituals of seppuku - and Zoro in the crosshairs! When a street assault occurs, all signs point to Zoro! Meanwhile, Luffy finally arrives at the Land of Wano but all his friends are nowhere to be found.
1.TitleJapanese: ワノ国! 桜舞うサムライの国へ
1.SummaryJapanese: 一足先にワノ国へ上陸、それぞれ目立たないように変装し、周囲に溶け込み、ルフィとの合流の時を待つ麦わらの一味。一方、再び仲間と離ればなれになったルフィ。ワノ国を舞台に今、新たな冒険の幕があがる！

2.TitleEnglish: Otama Appears! Luffy vs. Kaido's Army!
2.SummaryEnglish: Stranded alone on the beach, Luffy tries to gather his bearings only to be confronted by some mysterious, and dangerous, local fauna! And then, he meets a little girl named Otama! Meanwhile, Zoro makes trouble for the others who are trying to blend in!
2.TitleJapanese: お玉登場 ルフィVSカイドウ軍!

3.TitleEnglish: He'll Come! The Legend of Ace in the Land of Wano!
3.SummaryEnglish: Otama's gratitude towards Luffy knows no bounds! But the feast she cooks him exhausts her food stores completely! As she suffers from poor drinking water, her companion tells the story of the mysterious outsider she waits for - Ace!
3.TitleJapanese: 必ず来る ワノ国のエース伝説!

4.TitleEnglish: Side Story! The World's Greatest Bounty Hunter, Cidre!
4.SummaryEnglish: Ambushed and outgunned by a skilled bounty hunter Cidre’s group, the Straw Hats rely on the Sunny's Coup de Burst to escape! But they end up stranded without cola! A nearby soda island offers a solution - but Luffy is quickly in over his head! Luckily a vivacious old friend is nearby!
4.TitleJapanese: 特別編! 最強の賞金狩りシードル

5.TitleEnglish: Side Story! Clash! Luffy vs. the King of Carbonation!
5.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and Boa Hancock square off against the Cidre Guild! These unscrupulous bounty hunters have one thing in mind - profit at any cost! When the battle looks won, Cidre gears up in a menacing power suit!
5.TitleJapanese: 特別編! ルフィVS炭酸王

6.TitleEnglish: Save Otama! Straw Hat, Bounding through the Wasteland!
6.SummaryEnglish: Otama recounts her promise to Ace while Luffy rushes her to medical attention. But just as they reach the wasteland, a familiar face comes into view! But Kaido's underlings show up too!
6.TitleJapanese: お玉救え 麦わら荒野を駆ける!

7.TitleEnglish: The Headliner! Hawkins the Magician Appears!
7.SummaryEnglish: Otama’s temperature is going up and Luffy has no time to waste! However, Hawkins, one of Kaido’s Headliners, blocks their way by showing his unique powers and skills which can harm his own men.
7.TitleJapanese: 真打ち! 魔術師ホーキンス登場

8.TitleEnglish: Defeat is Inevitable! The Strawman's Fierce Attack!
8.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and Zoro have been stalled by Hawkins but their fortune looks bright as they are guided by a woman who Zoro had saved. She leads them to a teahouse and to an herbal remedy for the river poison. All the while, old acquaintances look on from a distance!
8.TitleJapanese: 敗北確定 ストローマンの猛攻!

9.TitleEnglish: The Greatest Day of My Life! Otama and Her Sweet Red-bean Soup!
9.SummaryEnglish: Otama's life is saved by Otsuru at her teahouse. The proud Otama finds it hard to take more kindness. The group learns of the Okobore Town - living on the cast-offs of the officials! Then, suddenly, they were attacked by the Shogun’s men!
9.TitleJapanese: 最高の日 お玉初めてのおしるこ

10.TitleEnglish: Charging into the Enemy's Territory! Bakura Town - Where Officials Thrive!
10.SummaryEnglish: Otama has been kidnapped by the Gifters! She is taken to a flourishing town called Bakura Town where a creepy-looking Headliner was expecting her. Luffy and Zoro rush to rescue her along with a samurai, Okiku!
10.TitleJapanese: 敵陣潜入 役人はびこる博羅町!

11.TitleEnglish: The Yokozuna Appears! The Invincible Urashima Goes After Okiku!
11.SummaryEnglish: As Luffy, Zoro, and Okiku bounce through Bakura Town on Komachiyo’s back, looking for the kidnapped Otama, a sumo wrestler comes flying towards them! Interested, they go down to watch sumo but the undefeated yokozuna Urashima has been expecting Okiku there and shows his brutal nature!
11.TitleJapanese: 横綱登場 お菊狙う無敵の浦島!

12.TitleEnglish: A Climactic Sumo Battle! Straw Hat vs. the Strongest Ever Yokozuna!
12.SummaryEnglish: Luffy challenges Urashima, the strongest yokozuna in the Land of Wano, to a sumo match! Urashima even uses illegal moves to beat Luffy at any cost! Meanwhile, Holdem tells Otama that he knows she committed a crime and he has to punish her for it.
12.TitleJapanese: 相撲決戦 麦わらVS最強の横綱!

13.TitleEnglish: Luffy Rages! Rescue Otama from Danger!
13.SummaryEnglish: After sending the yokozuna Urashima flying, Luffy and his clan continue their search for Bakura Town’s boss to save Otama! They finally find the boss, Holdem, one of the Beast Pirates’ Headliners, and Otama who is hanging in the mouth of a lion in Holdem’s stomach.
13.TitleJapanese: ルフィ激怒 ピンチのお玉を救え!

14.TitleEnglish: Taking Back Otama! A Fierce Fight Against Holdem!
14.SummaryEnglish: Facing Holdem who is holding Otama as hostage, Luffy prepares for a fight but Okiku tries to stop him by sharing who is really ruling the region. Meanwhile, Basil Hawkins who is also working for Kaido and chasing after Luffy, is confronted by a mysterious figure.
14.TitleJapanese: お玉争奪 激闘!ホームデム戦!

15.TitleEnglish: Duel! The Magician and the Surgeon of Death!
15.SummaryEnglish: Taking down Holdem, Luffy rescues Otama and tries to catch up to Zoro and Okiku who stole the food treasure ship and started a mad dash to get out of the town! Meanwhile, Trafalgar Law’s attempt to silence Basil Hawkins fails when he hears bad news about his alliance.
15.TitleJapanese: 一騎打ち 魔術師と死の外科医!

16.SummaryEnglish: This is a story of Luffy in an alternate reality. While sailing on the sea by himself, a strange bird crashes into his small boat. He looks up to find a giant ship where a girl named Ann has been captured. It seems like the bird belongs to her.
16.TitleJapanese: 20周年! 特別編ロマンスドーン

17.TitleEnglish: The Coming of the Treasure Ship! Luffytaro Returns the Favor!
17.SummaryEnglish: Zoro and the others dash out of BakuraTown on the treasure ship filled with food! Luffy catches up to them bringing ahuge bucket of fresh water! Then, they distribute the food and the water to thepeople of Okobore Town who were thirsty and hungry.
17.TitleJapanese: 宝船到来 ルフィ太郎の恩返し!

18.TitleEnglish: Mysterious Grave Markers! A Reunion at the Ruins of Oden Castle!
18.SummaryEnglish: Luffy arrives at the ruins of Oden Castle following Law and finds the graves of his friends, Kin’emon and the others. As Law starts telling the already-stunned Luffy about the creepy story of Kin’emon’s ghost, Luffy sees it coming towards him!
18.TitleJapanese: 謎の墓標 おでん城跡での再会!
18.SummaryJapanese: おでん城跡へと向かったルフィたち。しかし、その途中、ゾロは何者かの気配を察知して、一旦ルフィとわかれる事に。一方、花の都では、寺子屋で先生が子供達にワノ国の歴史を教えていた。だが、その教育ではワノ国の鎖国を肯定し、光月おでんと赤鞘九人男を愚か者として教え、黒炭オロチ将軍は賛美されていた……。オロチの命令で鎖国こそ正しく、光月家こそが悪、それを正したのがオロチだという歪められた歴史が子供たちに教えられていたのである。同じ頃、ある人物のお座敷に上がっていた芸者おロビ。そこでは、居眠り狂死郎が酒に酔いながら、オロチ将軍にまつわるある逸話を話していた。オロチ将軍は、20年前に死んだ光月家の亡霊達からの復讐を今も恐れているらしかった。

19.TitleEnglish: A Legendary Samurai! The Man Who Roger Admired!
19.SummaryEnglish: Kin’emon tells Luffy and the others about how Kozuki Oden made Kuri into a peaceful region and became its Daimyo. However, he was set up by Kaido and Kurozumi Orochi and executed. Kin’emon and his fellow vassals ran to Oden Castle in flames to save Oden’s wife Toki and children but Toki told him a shocking truth.
19.TitleJapanese: 伝説の侍 ロジャーが惚れた男！
19.SummaryJapanese: 錦えもんはルフィたちに真相を語る。モモの助の父・光月おでんはかつて花の都を追放され、当時は無法地帯だった九里へとやって来た。おでんはならず者たちをまとめ上げ、立派な九里の町を築いた。破天荒ながらも町民すべてに愛されていたおでんの逸話の数々に、興味津々のルフィたち。同じ頃、九里の海岸に到着したイヌアラシもおでんに思いをはせていた。一方、ルフィたちとはぐれてしまったゾロは船着き場を見つける。錦えもんの話は続き、おでんは黒炭オロチとカイドウの陰謀で罪人に仕立てられ処刑されたとルフィたちは知る。

20.TitleEnglish: Bringing Down the Emperor of the Sea! A Secret Raid Operation Begins!
20.SummaryEnglish: Kin’emon and the others crossed through time by the power of Kozuki Toki, Momonosuke’s mother, and arrived at the Land of Wano 20 years later, a totally different country before their eyes. However, discovering that there were still their allies there, they started preparing to take down Kaido and Orochi who ruined the country.
20.TitleJapanese: 打倒四皇 極秘討ち入り作戦発動
20.SummaryJapanese: 20年の時を越え、変わりはてたワノ国へたどり着いた錦えもんたち。その無残な変わり様に衝撃を受ける錦えもん達。共に戦うものはいないと思われた矢先、彼らの元に、この日を待ちわび耐え忍んできたと語る侍の一団が現れる。意気を取り戻した錦えもん達は、更なる仲間を求めワノ国を飛び出す。困難な旅の果てに、錦えもんはついにパンクハザードでルフィたちに出会うことができた。皆の協力が今回の策の要と、改めて錦えもんは作戦の内容を語り始める。

21.TitleEnglish: The Strongest Man in the World! Shutenmaru, the Thieves Brigade Chief!
21.SummaryEnglish: Ashura Doji, one of the allies Kin’emon wants to search for, has become the head of a thieves brigade and they now raid Okobore Town taking away the food that Luffy gave to the people. Ashura Doji, under the name Shutenmaru, then faces Kaido’s right-hand man and gets into a fierce fight!
21.TitleJapanese: 最強の男 盗賊団棟梁・酒天丸!
21.SummaryJapanese: 鬼ヶ島への討ち入りまで２週間。ウソップ、フランキー、ロビンはそれぞれの任務について準備を進めていた。ウソップは反乱の意志のある者――『左足に月の印を持つ者』たちに決戦の日と集合場所を図案にした判じ絵を配り歩き、フランキーはかつてカイドウの屋敷を設計した棟梁から屋敷の図を入手すべく大工の仕事をしていた。ロビンは芸者の稽古を積み、オロチのお座敷へ忍び込んで情報を入手しようとしていた。一方、ルフィたちはアシュラ童子の話を錦えもんから聞く。アシュラ童子はかつて、手のつけられない悪党だったが、おでんによって倒され、おでんの忠実な家来になったという。しかし、おでん亡き後は頭山盗賊団の酒天丸として再び悪事に手を染めているとのことだった。

22.TitleEnglish: Everyone is Annihilated! Kaido's Furious Blast Breath!
22.SummaryEnglish: The drunken Kaido flies above Okobore Town in his dragon form and threatens Shutenmaru and all the people in the town. Luffy, Law, Kin’emon, and Okiku start running towards the town to rescue them. However, Kaido heads towards the ruins of Oden Castle where they left their crew behind.
22.TitleJapanese: 全員消滅 カイドウ怒りのボロブレス！
22.SummaryJapanese: 巨大な龍となって九里へ現れたカイドウ。ルフィはおこぼれ町の町民を救う為、山を下りようと駆けだしてしまう。感情で動くルフィを止める為、ローが後を追う。町には妻・お鶴がいると聞いた錦えもんも、お菊と共に、山を駆け下りていく……!!

23.TitleEnglish: Finally Clashing! The Ferocious Luffy vs. Kaido!
23.SummaryEnglish: After Luffy sees Kaido shattering the ruins of Oden Castle where he left his friends, he becomes enraged and attacks Kaido! Soon after, he finds out Kaido even assaulted Otama who was riding on Speed’s back to her home. Furious, Luffy reveals himself to Kaido and starts to retaliate!
23.TitleJapanese: 遂に激突　猛攻ルフィVSカイドウ
23.SummaryJapanese: ボロブレスでおでん城跡を消滅させたカイドウに、単身で戦いを挑むルフィ。怒りに燃えるルフィは、カイドウに“ゴムゴムの象銃（エレファントガン）”を食らわせ、博羅町に墜落させる。仲間たちの無事を信じながらおでん城跡へと向かったルフィは、お玉と一緒だったスピードが傷を負い、倒れているところに遭遇した。

24.TitleEnglish: Destructive! One Shot, One Kill: Thunder Bagua!
24.SummaryEnglish: An infuriated Luffy strikes blow after blow on the drunken Kaido. When he activates Gear Four Bounce-Man and launches even more powerful attacks, Kaido fights back and knocks him out with just one blow. Law tries to rescue Luffy but is interrupted by Hawkins and now Kaido approaches Luffy, unconscious on the ground.
24.TitleJapanese: 破壊的！一撃必殺の雷鳴八卦！

25.TitleEnglish: A Living Hell! Luffy, Humiliated in the Great Mine!
25.SummaryEnglish: Luffy gets beaten by Kaido and is sent to a great mine where prisoners are made to work in forced labor. There, he finds an unexpected reunion. Meanwhile, Okiku is rushing to the ruins of Oden Castle in order to confirm the safety of the Straw Hats and the others.
25.TitleJapanese: 生き地獄！ルフィ屈辱の大探掘場

26.TitleEnglish: The Holyland in Tumult! Emperor of the Sea Blackbeard Cackles!
26.SummaryEnglish: On Gloom Island in the Grand Line, Perona finds out that her captain, Gecko Moria, is alive and she is about to leave Dracule Mihawk who let her stay there for the last two years. Meanwhile, Moria raids the Pirate Island of Fullalead with his zombie army to take back his friend from Blackbeard.
26.TitleJapanese: 聖地激動 不敵に笑う四皇黒ひげ

27.TitleEnglish: It's On! The Special Operation to Bring Down Kaido!
27.SummaryEnglish: Dogstorm fights against Shutenmaru to ally with him for their operation but Shutenmaru still rejects their call. Meanwhile, Sanji and the others are on their mission to recruit like-minded people who become skeptical as they receive the secret message from the Kozuki Clan.
27.TitleJapanese: 動き出す 打倒カイドウ大計画!

28.TitleEnglish: Rampage! The Prisoners: Luffy and Kid!
28.SummaryEnglish: In the Excavation Labor Camp, Luffy competes against Kid by hauling stones for food and they both get tons of it. However, Dobon, a vice warden, becomes furious when he finds out all their provisions are gone, and gives Luffy and Kid a new sentence: death.
28.TitleJapanese: 大暴れ！ 囚人ルフィとキッド！

29.TitleEnglish: A Great Sensation! Sanji's Special Soba!
29.SummaryEnglish: Sanji’s Special Soba becomes very popular but some gang members come to disturb his business and knock over a customer’s bowl. Infuriated, Sanji takes them down and gives the customer, a little girl named Toko, another serving. Later, Sanji and his friends find out that Toko is an attendant to an important figure in the Land of Wano.
29.TitleJapanese: 大評判！ サンジの十八番そば！

30.TitleEnglish: Luxurious and Gorgeous! Wano's Most Beautiful Woman: Komurasaki!
30.SummaryEnglish: Wano’s top courtesan Komurasaki is in procession and slowly makes her way to Orochi Palace. There is a crowd of people on the street as well as Sanji and the others. While everyone is fascinated by her, some seeking vengeance get in the Oiran’s way.
30.TitleJapanese: 豪華絢爛 ワノ国一の美女・小紫

31.TitleEnglish: A Tale of Chivalry! Zoro and Tonoyasu's Little Trip!
31.SummaryEnglish: Zoro who has been wandering around the Land of Wano since he got separated from his friends meets a sycophant named Tonoyasu. Tonoyasu paid for Zoro’s sushi and to pay him back, Zoro gambles at dice. However, he realizes that the dealer and the others are cheating.
31.TitleJapanese: 任侠伝! ゾロとトの康二人旅！

32.TitleEnglish: A State of Emergency! Big Mom Closes In!
32.SummaryEnglish: Zoro is taken to the sycophant Tonoyasu’s poor hometown, Ebisu Town where people laugh away their misfortune. On the other hand, Wano’s Shogun, Orochi has a lavish banquet while Big Mom is closing in on the country at a furious speed.
32.TitleJapanese: 緊急事態　ビッグ・マム大接近！

33.TitleEnglish: The Capital in an Uproar! Another Assassin Targets Sanji!
33.SummaryEnglish: As the Big Mom Pirates approach the Land of Wano, Kaido’s subordinates led by King and Queen try to get rid of them. Meanwhile, in the Flower Capital, another member of the Animal Kingdom Pirates, Page One, attacks every soba restaurant in the city, in search of Sanji.
33.TitleJapanese: 都騒然!サンジ狙う新たな刺客

34.SummaryEnglish: Sanji faces Page One, a Headliner of the Animal Kingdom Pirates, who questions the soba cook’s true identity. Sanji uses Germa’s device for the first time and transforms himself into Stealth Black while dubbing himself Soba Mask.
34.TitleJapanese: 大活躍！正義のおそばマスク！

35.TitleEnglish: A Desperate Situation! Orochi's Menacing Oniwabanshu!
35.SummaryEnglish: While the banquet grows livelier at Orochi’s Castle, Robin is confronted by his ninja force called Oniwabanshu. In the meanwhile in Kuri, Chopper, Tama, and Momonosuke train themselves preparing for the incoming battle but are interrupted when they find someone washed up on the beach.
35.TitleJapanese: 絶体絶命　脅威のオロチお庭番衆

36.TitleEnglish: Pandemonium! The Monster Snake, Shogun Orochi!
36.SummaryEnglish: At the banquet, the Shogun Orochi starts to talk about his late old enemy which bores the attendees. Suddenly, the Oiran’s child attendant Toko bursts with laughter and won’t stop. Orochi becomes furious and attacks her, but an unexpected person stands in his way.
36.TitleJapanese: 修羅場！ 恐れる大蛇将軍オロチ

37.TitleEnglish: The Flower Falls! The Final Moment of the Most Beautiful Woman in the Land of Wano!
37.SummaryEnglish: In order to save her child attendant Toko, the top Oiran Komurasaki stands up to the Shogun Orochi, but the yakuza boss Kyoshiro interrupts and does something that no one expected. Meanwhile, Robin is trying to get out of Orochi’s Castle with the help of Nami and Brook.
37.TitleJapanese: 花散る！ワノ国一の美女の最期

38.TitleEnglish: The Bond Between Prisoners! Luffy and Old Man Hyo!
38.SummaryEnglish: Nami, Robin, and the others got away from Oden’s Castle and now discuss what they have found out about the enemy so far. Meanwhile, Chopper’s group sets off to rescue Luffy from the Excavation Labor Camp where, at the same time, Luffy is in big trouble.
38.TitleJapanese: 囚人の絆 ルフィとヒョウしい！

39.TitleEnglish: A Lead Performer! Queen the Plague Emerges!
39.SummaryEnglish: At the Excavation Labor Camp in Udon, Luffy tries to save Old Man Hyo and stands up to Vice Warden Daifuku and Warden Babanuki with his physical strength weakened by the Sea Prism Stone cuffs. Then when a Lead Performer of the Animal Kingdom Pirates, Queen the Plague, comes to the camp, Luffy makes an escape!
39.TitleJapanese: 大看板！疫災のクイーン現る

40.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and Old Man Hyo try to climb up the wall and break out of the Excavation Labor Camp, but Queen the Plague stands in their way and gives them a hard time! Meanwhile, Nami and Robin experience a public bathhouse along with Shinobu and come to know about the Land of Wano’s great yakuza boss.
40.TitleJapanese: よじ登れ ルフィ決死の逃走劇!

41.TitleEnglish: Dead or Alive! Queen's Sumo Inferno!
41.SummaryEnglish: Luffy fights quite a few Queen’s men at once in the deadly sumo match while protecting Old Man Hyo! Meanwhile, Nami, Robin, and Shinobu are cornered as Hawkins comes to raid the bathhouse. However, someone who they don’t expect to be there pops up from nowhere to save them.
41.TitleJapanese: 生か死か クイーンの大相撲地獄

42.TitleEnglish: Gyukimaru! Zoro Fights a Duel on Bandit's Bridge!
42.SummaryEnglish: Luffy deals with the endless supply of opponents trying to figure out the way to use Haki that Rayleigh taught him a while ago. Meanwhile, Zoro faces Gyukimaru who is accusing him of stealing Shusui, however, their duel is interrupted by a woman’s scream.
42.TitleJapanese: 牛鬼丸！ソ口おいはぎ橋の決闘

43.TitleEnglish: A Big Turnover! The Three-Sword Style Overcomes Danger!
43.SummaryEnglish: The duel between Zoro and Gyukimaru is interrupted by Kamazo, Orochi’s assassin who came after a little girl Toko. Without Shusui, Zoro has a hard time fighting the two at the same time, but he finds an unlikely third sword to take down the enemies.
43.TitleJapanese: 大逆転！ 死線を越えた三刀流！

44.TitleEnglish: Zoro, Stunned! The Shocking Identity of the Mysterious Woman!
44.SummaryEnglish: Luffy’s next enemies in the deadly sumo match in the Excavation Labor Camp are two tough Gifters. Much to Old Man Hyo’s surprise, Luffy keeps practicing using Haki properly at the same time as he fights them. Meanwhile, the wounded Zoro wakes up to find out the stunning identity of the mysterious woman he saved.
44.TitleJapanese: ゾロ驚愕 衝撃！謎の美女の正体

45.TitleEnglish: Get the Hang of It! The Land of Wano's Haki - Ryuo!
45.SummaryEnglish: Hiyori tells Zoro a stunning story of escaping the incident 20 years ago and surviving until the present day. Meanwhile, Luffy stills struggles to master the Haki of the Color of Arms, but a surprising person steps up and gives an example.
45.TitleJapanese: 会得せよ ワノ国の覇気・流桜

46.SummaryEnglish: Luffy continues training himself to use Haki with Old Man Hyo’s help, but the battle is suddenly suspended and shortly thereafter Raizo appears in front of them. Meanwhile, Nami, Usopp, and the others are wondering who Tonoyasu, Ebisu Town’s hero, really is.
46.TitleJapanese: トの康! えびす町の一の人気者

47.TitleEnglish: Shaking the Nation! The Identity of Ushimitsu Kozo The Chivalrous Thief!
47.SummaryEnglish: Ushimitsu Kozo the great thief who robbed from the rich and gave to the poor gets caught and his true identity stuns Orochi and the others. When Toko hears the news, she gets very upset and so is Zoro when he hears the reason.
47.TitleJapanese: 衝撃走る 義賊丑三つ小僧の正体

48.TitleEnglish: The Straw Hats Run! Save the Captive Tonoyasu!
48.SummaryEnglish: Tonoyasu has been strung up and is soon-to-be executed. The people of the Land of Wano recognize who he really is and start raising their voice while the Straw Hats rush to save him. Then, Tonoyasu starts addressing the nation and the corrupt Shogun Orochi.
48.TitleJapanese: 一味疾る! 救え囚われのトの康

49.TitleEnglish: Zoro's Fury! The Truth About the Smile!
49.SummaryEnglish: By the time Kin’emon and the others notice that Yasuie is trying to sacrifice his life to save their raid plan, it was all too late. Ebisu Town's people laughing out loud annoys Zoro, but when Hiyori tells him the reason behind it, he is in for a shock!
49.TitleJapanese: ゾロの怒り SMILEの真実！

50.SummaryEnglish: As the citizens of Ebisu Town grieve over Yasuie's death, Shinobu reveals more information about the SMILE fruits. Toko enters the execution site, hoping to revive her father. Seeing Toko, Orochi attempts to kill her as well, but Zoro and Sanji step in and save her.
50.TitleJapanese: トコの涙！オロチ非情の銃弾！

51.TitleEnglish: The Straw Hats Step In! An Uproarious Deadly Battle at the Execution Ground!
51.SummaryEnglish: Zoro and Sanji start fighting against Orochi’s clan. Nami and the rest of the Straw Hats join them. Meanwhile, at the Excavation Labor Camp, a new criminal, Hitokiri Kamazo, has arrived. And someone else who is brought to the site reveals the shocking truth about Kamazo.
51.TitleJapanese: 一味乱入！騒然！ 処刑場の激闘

52.TitleEnglish: Luffy's Determination! Win Through the Sumo Inferno!
52.SummaryEnglish: Zoro clashes with Kyoshiro and Sanji clashes with X Drake while Usopp takes Toko to safety. The Orochi Oniwabanshu arrives to confront the Straw Hat Pirates. Law arrives at the Rasetsu Town prison to rescue his captured crewmates, but he is confronted by Hawkins. Back at Udon, Queen subjects Kid and Killer to water torture as he resumes the Sumo Inferno. However, Big Mom arrives at the Prisoner Mines.
52.TitleJapanese: ルフィの決意 破れ大相撲地獄！

53.TitleEnglish: The Storm Has Come! A Raging Big Mom!
53.SummaryEnglish: After the skirmish inside the Flower Capital, Kin'emon confesses to Ashura Doji that he provoked Holdem into attacking Mt. Atama. When Ashura becomes angry, Kin'emon admits his mistake for trying to force Ashura to join the rebellion and once again begs him for his help. After Chopper's group arrives at the Prisoner Mines, Big Mom breaks in. During her search for red bean soup, she gets into a fight with Queen.
53.TitleJapanese: 嵐到来！ 大暴れビッグ・マム！

54.TitleEnglish: A Grudge Over Red Bean Soup! Luffy Gets into a Desperate Situation!
54.SummaryEnglish: Big Mom subdues Queen when the latter tries to fight her. During that scuffle, Kid and Killer are saved from drowning. Big Mom does not find any red bean soup, and when Luffy blurts out that he ate it, she attacks him out of rage. Luffy and Hyogoro are forced out of the ring, but Luffy manages to remove the collars before they are killed. Afterwards, Hyogoro decides to test Luffy by having him defend against Big Mom's attack.
54.TitleJapanese: おしるこの恨み ルフィ絶体絶命

55.TitleEnglish: Stop the Emperor of the Sea! Queen's Secret Plan!
55.SummaryEnglish: After finding out that Luffy ate the whole pot ofthe red-bean soup that she was looking for, Big Mom becomes infuriated and goesafter him. Meanwhile, Queen, the Lead Performer, comes up with a plan to stopthe rampaging Big Mom.
55.TitleJapanese: 四皇を止めろ！クイーンの秘策

56.TitleEnglish: Brutal Ammunition! The Plague Rounds Aim at Luffy!
56.SummaryEnglish: Queen hastily ties up the sleeping Big Mom and carries her to Onigashima leaving Udon to Babanuki. Babanuki uses a weapon that Queen made to threaten inmates and make them catch Luffy, but a mysterious figure emerges from the forbidden cell to save Luffy.
56.TitleJapanese: 最凶兵器！ルフィを狙う疫災弾

57.TitleEnglish: Start Fighting Back! Luffy and the Red-Scabbard Samurai!
57.SummaryEnglish: Raizo retrieves the keys to Kawamatsu's cell as well as his sword. The ninja later gives them to him, and Kawamatsu frees himself. After Raizo, Kawamatsu, and Kikunojo reunite, they joined up with Luffy and Hyogoro in fighting the Beasts Pirates. However, the Beasts Pirates continue infecting prisoners with Excite Bullets.
57.TitleJapanese: 反撃開始！ルフィと赤鞘の侍！

58.TitleEnglish: We're Here to Win! Luffy's Desperate Scream!
58.SummaryEnglish: Luffy faces those who are infected by the Plague Rounds and the non-infected prisoners who submit to the authority of Udon. To open their eyes, Luffy takes a measure that will risk his life. However, the Chief Warden Babanuki has something up his sleeve.
58.TitleJapanese: 勝ちに来た！ルフィ決死の叫び

59.TitleEnglish: Warriors' Dream! Luffy's Conquer of Udon!
59.SummaryEnglish: After Udon is conquered, Chopper tends to Luffy and works to develop a cure for his condition. Luffy asks Kid to join the fight against Kaido, but Kid rejects his offer and leaves Udon with Killer. After finding out that Luffy is a pirate, the prisoners distrust him, but Momonosuke speaks to them and convinces them to join the cause to liberate Wano Country. Elsewhere, Ashura Doji reveals to Kin'emon and Inuarashi that he had comrades who were too impatient to wait for the Kozuki Family to return and died when they tried to fight Kaido. Afterwards, Ashura comes around and decides to rejoin Kin'emon.
59.TitleJapanese: 兵どもが夢! ルフィ兎丼制圧!
59.SummaryJapanese: ルフィの捨て身の行動により、誇りを取り戻した囚人たち。反逆を決め、ダイフゴーら真打、看守たちを自らの手で倒すのだった。意気揚々と勝どきを上げる囚人たちだったが、ルフィが海賊であることを知り、ルフィから心が離れていく。カイドウに虐げられていた彼らにとって、海賊は信用ならない存在なのだ。そこにモモの助が姿を現すと、囚人たちは感激の涙を流す。モモの助という「希望」を得た彼らは、皆心をひとつにして忠誠を誓う。

60.TitleEnglish: Orochi's Hunting Party! The Ninja Group vs. Zoro!
60.SummaryEnglish: After standing against Orochi, Zoro and Hiyori are chased by Orochi’s ninja group. Meanwhile, Orochi is told that they captured Trafalgar Law as the people of the Flower Capital prepare for the upcoming Fire Festival.
60.TitleJapanese: オロチの追手! 忍者軍団VSゾロ
60.SummaryJapanese: 日和を連れて逃走するゾロは、オロチお庭番衆の風刃と彼の手下たちの襲撃を受ける。忍術を駆使して襲いかかる風刃たちを倒し、盗まれた秋水を一刻も早く取り戻したいと考えていた。その頃、花の都には麦わらの一味と仲間達の人相書が貼られ、見廻組の侍達による厳重な警戒が始まった。その様子を目の当たりにしたサンジとしのぶは、以前にも増して不利な状況に陥ったと悟る。

61.TitleEnglish: Tension Rises in Onigashima! Two Emperors of the Sea Meet?!
61.SummaryEnglish: As the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance continues with their preparations for the Fire Festival, Zoro returns to Oihagi Bridge along with Hiyori and he challenges Gyukimaru again to reclaim Shusui. The battle is then interrupted by Kawamatsu. Big Mom has been taken to Onigashima, where she and Kaido begin clashing.
61.TitleJapanese: 鬼ヶ島緊迫! 遭遇!? 二人の四皇
61.SummaryJapanese: えびす町で年老いた町民達に囲まれているカン十郎。その胸に抱いた康イエの亡骸を、責任持って供養とすると町民達に約束する。ＳＭＩＬＥの影響で笑いながらも悲しげな町民達の姿を遠くから見ていたナミとフランキーは、討ち入りへの想いを新たに出発する。

62.TitleEnglish: Hiyori's Confession! A Reunion at Bandit's Bridge!
62.SummaryEnglish: At Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom continue with their clash. Queen contacts Udon, and Babanuki, having been tamed by Tama, gives Queen a false report. Back at Udon, Hyogoro gets reacquainted with the other yakuza leaders, who join the rebellion. At Oihagi Bridge, Hiyori and Kawamatsu have a heartfelt reunion. The reunion is cut short as a group of Beasts Pirates arrives, seeking revenge on Gyukimaru. Zoro and Kawamatsu defeat the attackers, and Gyukimaru flees the scene with Zoro chasing after him.
62.TitleJapanese: 日和の告白！おいはぎ橋の再会

63.TitleEnglish: Its Name Is Enma! Oden's Great Swords!
63.SummaryEnglish: After the reunion, Kawamatsu tells Hiyori about everything that happened to him since they separated.
63.TitleJapanese: その名は閻魔！おでんの名刀！
63.SummaryJapanese: Sono Na wa Enma! Oden no Meitō!

64.TitleEnglish: A New Alliance?! Kaido's Army Gathers!
64.SummaryEnglish: At the secret place where Kawamatsu stored weapons, Zoro agrees to return Shusui in exchange for Enma. At the Flower Capital, Law subdues Hawkins and escapes prison with the help from an unknown individual. As the day of the Fire Festival draws closer, the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance continues with their preparations for the raid on Onigashima. Apoo returns to Wano with a group of gigantic beings known as the Numbers. At Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom decide to put aside their feud and form an alliance to conquer the world.
64.TitleJapanese: 新たな同盟！？カイドウ軍大集結
64.SummaryJapanese: 同盟国は鬼ヶ島の包囲に備え続けているので、海道には他の計画もあります。

65.TitleEnglish: Ticking Down to the Great Battle! The Straw Hats Go into Combat Mode!
65.SummaryEnglish: Hiyori parted ways with Zoro and Kawamatsu, and the two later inform Momonosuke and the Scabbards with him of her survival. Zoro receives Enma and sees its destructive power. Luffy continues training his Busoshoku Haki and Zoro trains with his new sword. Meanwhile, the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance adds more numbers to their cause and finish up with their preparations. On the day before the Fire Festival, Momonosuke and his group of retainers march to the rendezvous point to meet up with their allies.
65.TitleJapanese: 迫る決戦！麦わら一味戦闘態勢

66.TitleEnglish: Big News! An Incident That Will Affect the Seven Warlords!
66.SummaryEnglish: After the Reverie concluded, big news concerning Sabo spread throughout the world. Those who knew Sabo become distressed after reading the news about him. Koby and X Drake have a private conversation via Den Den Mushi, and Drake informs Koby about the newly formed alliance between Kaido and Big Mom and the recent presence of CP-0 in Wano Country. Thanks to the efforts of Nefertari Cobra and Riku Doldo III, the Seven Warlords of the Sea have been abolished. Now that the Warlords are no longer affiliated with the World Government, the Marines pursue the former members.
66.TitleJapanese: 大ニュース！七武海を襲う事件

67.TitleEnglish: A Legendary Battle! Garp and Roger!
67.SummaryEnglish: At the new Marine Headquarters, the Marine officers hold a meeting. Sengoku explains about the Rocks Pirates and the history concerning this crew. Brannew then reveals the bounty of each of the current Emperors as well as Gol D. Roger and Edward Newgate. Sakazuki declares that the Marines will not go to Wano Country and Sengoku talks about Kozuki Oden.
67.TitleJapanese: 伝説の戦い! ガープとロジャー

68.TitleEnglish: The Rendezvous Port! The Land of Wano Act Three Begins!
68.SummaryEnglish: On the day of the Fire Festival, Orochi leaves the mainland of the Land of Wano heading for Onigashima where a big banquet will take place. Meanwhile, at Tokage Port, the rendezvous point for the rebel group, Kin’emon and the others are stunned by the fact that none of their allies are there.
68.TitleJapanese: 約束の港！ワノ国編第三幕開幕

69.TitleEnglish: The Number-One Samurai in the Land of Wano! Here Comes Kozuki Oden!
69.SummaryEnglish: It is revealed that Orochi had the Beasts Pirates bombed the Thousand Sunny and destroyed some bridges to cut off routes to Tokage Port. At the port, the Nine Red Scabbards prepare to continue with the raid on their own. A flashback to many years ago begins. Back then, Oden was a well-known troublemaker. A younger Kin'emon takes a baby white boar from some thugs and brings it to the Flower Capital to gain money. However, the boar's parent, the Mountain God, arrives at the capital and wreaks havoc.
69.TitleJapanese: ワノ国一の侍！光月おでん登場

70.TitleEnglish: Tearfully Swearing Allegiance! Oden and Kin'emon!
70.SummaryEnglish: The Mountain God continues its rampage in the Flower Capital until Oden confronts and defeats it. After this incident, Oden was expelled from the capital. Due to their admiration for Oden, Kin'emon and Denjiro decide to follow him. After staying with Shimotsuki Yasuie for a time, Oden decides to travel to Kuri. Along the way, Oden is also joined by Izo, Kikunojo, Kanjuro, and Raizo. Oden eventually arrives at Kuri and prepares to fight the bandits there.
70.TitleJapanese: 涙の弟子入り おでんと錦えもん

71.TitleEnglish: Changing Destiny! The Whitebeard Pirates Cast Ashore!
71.SummaryEnglish: Oden transforms the wild land of Kuri into a habitable region and is made Daimyo over it. Then he meets Kawamatsu the Kappa and the two Minks, Dogstorm and Cat Viper, who become his followers like the others. Kin’emon and the other vassals are scolded by Yasuie when they try to steal money from him, and they begin reforming themselves for their lord Oden.
71.TitleJapanese: 動く運命漂着！白ひげ海賊団！

72.SummaryEnglish: Kozuki Oden's dreams to leave Wano lead him directly to Whitebeard after he learns of the pirate's arrival. After a brief battle, Oden begs Whitebeard to let him join his crew. Whitebeard denies his request due to concerns about Oden's character. Once their ship is repaired, the Whitebeard Pirates leave at night to avoid Oden's advances but he catches up anyway, attaching a chain to the ship and riding with Izo through the ocean. Marco saves Izo and brings him onto the Moby Dick where he is tied up. Whitebeard tells Oden that if he holds on for three days, he can join the crew. Three days have passed and Oden only has an hour left before he can join the crew. However, after hearing the screams of Amatsuki Toki, Oden lets go of the chain to save her life.
72.TitleJapanese: おでんの決意！白ひげの試練！

73.TitleEnglish: Whitebeard's Little Brother! Oden's Great Adventure!
73.SummaryEnglish: Toki tends to Oden after he rescued her from the kidnappers. On the next day, they are confronted by the kidnappers and their leader, Karma. Whitebeard intervenes and knocks out Karma. Whitebeard accepts Oden into his crew because of his selflessness. Toki, Izo, and the stowaways Inuarashi and Nekomamushi become part of Whitebeard's crew as well. Oden travels to various places and has many eventful experiences. Oden and Toki also has a son together and the infant is given the name Kozuki Momonosuke.
73.TitleJapanese: 白ひげの弟！おでんの大冒険！

74.SummaryEnglish: Orochi plots to take the shogunate with Higurashi's assistance. As Oden continues his journey with the Whitebeard Pirates, he finally encounters the Roger Pirates. A clash between Edward Newgate and Gol D. Roger ensues.
74.TitleJapanese: 交える刃！ロジャーと白ひげ！

75.SummaryEnglish: Roger is amazed when he finds out that Oden can read the script on the Ponegliff since he believes it will guide him to the last, undiscovered island where no man has ever been. Roger begs Whitebeard for permission to take Oden with him on a one-year journey. But Oden gives it some thought and speaks his mind as well!
75.TitleJapanese: ロジャーの願い！新たな旅立ち

76.TitleEnglish: The Bet of a Lifetime! Roger's Adventure!
76.SummaryEnglish: Singing out loud, the Roger Pirates continue on with their journey. They soar up to the island above the clouds and go down into the deep sea to get to the island at the sea bottom. Oden deciphers the Ponegliffs on those islands for Roger who believes those inscriptions will tell them the location of the last island on the Grand Line.
76.TitleJapanese: 生涯をかけて！ロジャーの冒険

77.TitleEnglish: The King of Pirates Is Born! Arriving at the Last Island!
77.SummaryEnglish: Oden and the Roger Pirates head for the Land of Wano to obtain a copy of the Road Ponegliff. Oden sees Kin’emon and the others for the first time in years, but he immediately returns to the sea leaving his wife and children behind. Then, after stopping by at the Mokomo Dukedom and getting a copy of the last Road Ponegliff, the Roger Pirates finally make it to the last island.
77.TitleJapanese: 海賊王誕生 到達! "最後の島"

78.TitleEnglish: To the Land of Wano! The Roger Pirates Disband!
78.SummaryEnglish: After reaching Laugh Tale, Roger declares the disbanding of his pirate group and disembarks first. Oden gets dropped off at the Land of Wano and reunites with his family and retainers. Later, he hears that Orochi took over the country with the help of a strong pirate named Kaido after the Shogun Sukiyaki’s death and becomes enraged by stories of his tyrannical acts.
78.TitleJapanese: ワノ国へ！ロジャー海賊団解散

79.TitleEnglish: Sad News! The Opening of the Great Pirate Era!
79.SummaryEnglish: Enraged by Orochi’s tyrannical acts, Oden raids his castle in the Flower Capital and points his sword at Orochi. However, hours later, people who were waiting for Oden to come out after defeating Orochi see the unexpected. Meanwhile, the King of the Pirates Roger’s execution and last words are printed in newspapers and spread across the world.
79.TitleJapanese: 悲しき知らせ 大海賊時代幕開け

80.TitleEnglish: Raid! Oden and the Nine Red Scabbards!
80.SummaryEnglish: Oden keeps dancing naked in the Flower Capital and losing all the trust of the people. One day, Orochi comes to Kuri and reveals his evil plan for the Land of Wano as well as his brutalities against the country’s mobster and Oden’s friend, Hyogoro and his wife. Despairing and in a rage, Oden finally decides to take down Orochi’s supporter, Kaido.
80.TitleJapanese: 討ち入り！おでんと赤鞘九人男

81.TitleEnglish: The Moment of Conclusion! Oden vs. Kaido!
81.SummaryEnglish: Kaido comes to the mainland along with his troops to fight against Oden and the Akazaya samurai who were on their way to raid Kaido’s mansion. Even though Oden’s group are unprepared and outnumbered, they fight hard to save the future of the Land of Wano.
81.TitleJapanese: 決着の時！おでんVSカイドウ！

82.TitleEnglish: Boiled to Death! Oden's One-Hour Struggle!
82.SummaryEnglish: Oden and the Akazaya members are sentenced to death by boiling in a pot. Oden asks for a chance to survive which is accepted by Kaido. Then, Oden enters the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head. Shinobu watches from among the spectators and reveals what Oden had been doing to save the country, to the surprise of the citizens.
82.TitleJapanese: 釜茹での刑 おでん決死の一時間

83.TitleEnglish: Oden Wouldn't Be Oden If It Wasn't Boiled!
83.SummaryEnglish: As Oden continues trying to survive in the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head, people learn the truth from Shinobu and get shocked. At the same time, Oden tells his retainers the importance of opening the borders of the Land of Wano. Time ticks down for Oden and his clan’s freedom.
83.TitleJapanese: 煮えてなんぼのおでんに候

84.TitleEnglish: The Castle on Fire! The Fate of the Kozuki Clan!
84.SummaryEnglish: As Kin’emon and the others run to Oden Castle to save Oden’s family, the castle is set on fire and Kaido attacks Toki and her children. Leaving Momonosuke to Kin’emon and Hiyori to Kawamatsu, Toki appears in front of the desperate people of the Land of Wano and gives a prophecy.
84.TitleJapanese: 燃える城！光月の一族の運命！

85.TitleEnglish: Back to the Present Day! 20 Years Later!
85.SummaryEnglish: After 20 years since Oden Castle burned down, Oden’s surviving retainers are working hard separately at their own missions, believing in Toki’s prophecy. The day of the Fire Festival has finally come and the whole army is now getting ready to head for Onigashima to raid Kaido!
85.TitleJapanese: 再び現在！二十年の時をこえて
85.SummaryJapanese: おでん城が焼失してから20年、トキの予言を信じて、生き残ったおでんの家臣たちは、それぞれの使命に別々に取り組んでいる。 いよいよ火まつりの日がやってきて、全軍が鬼ヶ島に向かって海道を襲撃する準備をしています！

86.TitleEnglish: The Sea Is for Pirates! Raid! To Onigashima!
86.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats and thousands of allies who were supposed to be there are nowhere to be found, but Kin’emon and the others decide to set sail to the stormy sea in a small boat. Kaido’s army that appears out of nowhere and a betrayal drive the Akazaya members into a corner.
86.TitleJapanese: 海は海賊！討入り！いざ鬼ヶ島

87.TitleEnglish: The Worst Generation Charges In! The Battle of the Stormy Sea!
87.SummaryEnglish: Luffy, Law, and Kid join the Akazaya samurai and begin to fight Kaido’s army. The three rivals from the Worst Generation compete with each other as they attack the enemy fleet with their ultimate skills. When it seems like they gain upper hand in the battle, another strong enemy appears to help Kaido’s army.
87.TitleJapanese: 最悪の世代が突入！ 嵐の海の戦い！
87.SummaryJapanese: ルフィ、ロー、キッドが赤座屋侍に加わり、カイドウの軍隊と戦い始める。 最悪の世代の3人のライバルは、究極のスキルで敵の艦隊を攻撃しながら互いに競争します。 彼らが戦いで優位に立っているように見えるとき、別の強力な敵がカイドウの軍隊を助けているように見えます。

88.SummaryEnglish: The Akazaya members are surprised by help from their old mate and Kin’emon notices he made a big mistake which has luckily saved all his allies. As their battle against Kaido’s army heats up, the cornered Kanjuro makes a stunning move.
88.TitleJapanese: 強運！？リーダー錦えもんの一計
88.SummaryJapanese: 赤座屋のメンバーは昔の仲間の助けに驚いており、金右衛門は彼が大きな間違いを犯したことに気づき、幸運にもすべての仲間を救った。 カイドウの軍隊との戦いが熱くなると、追い詰められた神十郎は見事な動きをします。

89.TitleEnglish: A Tearful Promise! The Kidnapped Momonosuke!
89.SummaryEnglish: Swept away by Kanjuro, Momonosuke remembers his father, tries to rise above his fear, and speak to his allies. Luffy and the others start heading for Onigashima, but Kaido’s army gets in their way again with a formidable weapon. However, a surprising figure comes to help the cornered Straw Hats.
89.TitleJapanese: 涙の約束！さらわれたモモの助
89.SummaryJapanese: 神十郎に流された桃之助は、父親のことを思い出し、恐怖を乗り越え、仲間に話しかける。 ルフィたちが鬼ヶ島に向かい始めるが、カイドウの軍隊は手ごわい武器で再び邪魔をする。 しかし、驚くべき数字が追い詰められた麦わら帽子を助けるようになります。

90.TitleEnglish: A New Member! 'First Son of the Sea' Jimbei!
90.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hat crew are excited to see Jimbei again and welcome him as a new member. Meanwhile, Law and the Akazaya members strategize on how to enter Onigashima and attack Kaido. As the Straw Hats approach the giant torii gate in front of Onigashima, they are attacked out of the blue.
90.TitleJapanese: 新たな仲間！海侠のジンべエ！
90.SummaryJapanese: ルフィと麦わらの一味の残りの乗組員は、ジンベイに再び会い、彼を新しいメンバーとして歓迎することに興奮しています。 一方、ローとアカザヤのメンバーは、鬼ヶ島に入り、カイドウを攻撃する方法について戦略を立てています。 麦わら帽子が鬼ヶ島の前にある巨大な鳥居に近づくと、突然襲われます。

91.TitleEnglish: Kaido's Trump Card! The Tobi Roppo Appear!
91.SummaryEnglish: To Law and the others’ surprise, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats attack the giant torii gate in front of Onigashima. Meanwhile, Kaido and Orochi are having a big banquet on the island where Kaido’s formidable subordinates, the Tobi Roppo, are called in.
91.TitleJapanese: カイドウの切り札 飛び六胞登場
91.SummaryJapanese: 法と他の人の驚いたことに、ルフィと残りの麦わら帽子は鬼ヶ島の前にある巨大な鳥居を攻撃します。 一方、カイドウとオロチは、カイドウの手ごわい部下であるトビロッポが呼ばれる島で大宴会を開いています。

92.TitleEnglish: The Samurai Warriors' Earnestness! The Straw Hats Land at Onigashima!
92.SummaryEnglish: The Straw Hats and the samurai warriors finally reach Onigashima! Before they set out for the castle as they planned, the samurai warriors use surprising but determined tactics to cut off their retreat which leave the Straw Hats in shock.
92.TitleJapanese: 侍たちの本気！一味鬼ヶ島上陸
92.SummaryJapanese: ルフィはキッドと競って鬼ヶ島に突入。一方、ローの潜航艇内部も鬼ヶ島裏の入り口へ向けて潜航開始。鬼ヶ島へと到達すると、全体がお祭りムードであった。

93.TitleEnglish: Luffy Goes Out of Control! Sneaking into Kaido's Banquet!
93.SummaryEnglish: Eustass Kid and his clan start heading for Kaido's castle head on waving Luffy off. Luffy and Zoro go after them to stop them from causing trouble, but they happen to step into Kaido’s banquet. Meanwhile, Kanjuro loses his way to Kaido in underground passages with Momonosuke who he kidnapped in tow.
93.TitleJapanese: ルフィが暴走！ カイドウの宴会に忍び込む！
93.SummaryJapanese: ユースタス・キッドとその氏族は、ルフィを振り払ってカイドウの城頭に向かい始めます。 ルフィとゾロはトラブルを起こさないように追いかけますが、たまたま海道の宴会に足を踏み入れました。 そんな中、神十郎は誘拐された桃之助と地下通路で海道への道を失う。

94.TitleEnglish: Thinking of Otama! Luffy's Furious Strike!
94.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and Zoro each witness Kaido’s subordinates waste food at the banquet and make fun of the poor people in the Land of Wano. Thinking of Otama, a small girl who liked red-bean soup so much, both Luffy and Zoro become infuriated and create turmoil.
94.TitleJapanese: お玉への思い ルフィ怒りの一撃
94.SummaryJapanese: ルフィとゾロはそれぞれ、カイドウの部下が宴会で食べ物を無駄にし、和野の国の貧しい人々をからかうのを目撃します。 小豆汁が大好きな小豆のオタマのことを考えると、ルフィもゾロも激怒して混乱を引き起こします。

95.TitleEnglish: Fighting Music! An Ability That Harms Luffy!
95.SummaryEnglish: After making a scene at the Golden Festival, Luffy and Zoro try to get away, but Queen announces to his subordinates that anyone who catches them will be rewarded with a position in the Tobi Roppo. Scratchmen Apoo stands in Luffy and Zoro’s way and with his ability to use music as a weapon, he launches unpredictable attacks which corner Luffy and Zoro.
95.TitleJapanese: 戦う音楽！ルフィを襲う能力！
95.SummaryJapanese: ゴールデンフェスティバルでシーンを作った後、ルフィとゾロは逃げようとしますが、クイーンは部下に、彼らを捕まえた人は誰でもトビロッポのポジションで報われると発表します。 スクラッチメン・アプーはルフィとゾロの邪魔をし、音楽を武器として使用する能力を持って、ルフィとゾロを追い詰める予測不可能な攻撃を開始します。

96.TitleEnglish: His Dream Broken?! The Trap That Lures Sanji!
96.SummaryEnglish: Haccha, a supergiant Number, joins in and the pursuit of Luffy and the others becomes even more intense. Meanwhile, Kin’emon changes his strategy and his group tries to infiltrate the castle from its side, but there is an unexpected change of the floor plan which coincidentally makes Sanji excited.
96.TitleJapanese: 彼の夢は壊れた？！ サンジを誘惑する罠！
96.SummaryJapanese: 超巨星のハッチャが加わり、ルフィらの追撃がさらに激しくなる。 その間、金右衛門は戦略を変え、彼のグループは城の横から潜入しようとしますが、偶然にもサンジを興奮させる間取り図の予期しない変更があります。

97.TitleEnglish: Reinforcements Arrive! The Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates!
97.SummaryEnglish: Luffy, Law, Kin’emon, and all the others are trying to infiltrate Kaido’s castle from all sides. Meanwhile, Big Mom’s children are climbing up the waterfall towards Onigashima again, but this time, Marco the Phoenix appears from nowhere and stands in their way!
97.TitleJapanese: 増援到着！ 白ひげ海賊団の司令官！
97.SummaryJapanese: ルフィ、ロー、キンエモンなど、カイドウの城に四方八方から潜入しようとしています。 そんな中、ビッグママの子供たちが再び鬼ヶ島に向かって滝を登っていますが、今回はどこからともなく現れて邪魔をするフェニックスのマルコ！

98.TitleEnglish: The Pact Between Men! The Fierce Fighting of Brachio Tank!
98.SummaryEnglish: The furious Big Mom chases Brachio Tank driven by Chopper and Usopp, but they bravely fight back! Meanwhile, Kanjuro takes the battered and bruised Momonosuke to Kaido and Orochi, then breaks the news to them about Oden’s retainers who were thought to be dead.
98.TitleJapanese: 男性同士の協定！ ブラキオ戦車の激しい戦い！

99.TitleEnglish: Thunder Bagua! Here Comes Kaido's Son!
99.SummaryEnglish: Luffy runs into Ulti and Page One, members of the Tobi Roppo from the Animal Kingdom Pirates. Hearing that he aims to become the King of the Pirates, the brother and sister duo become infuriated and turn themselves into massive beasts. When Luffy is driven into a corner, someone wearing a demon mask appears and whisks him away.
99.TitleJapanese: 雷鳴八卦! 登場カイドウの息子

100.TitleEnglish: Enemy or Ally? Luffy and Yamato!
100.SummaryEnglish: Evading Ulti and Page One, strong members of the Tobi Roppo, Luffy tries to find out what Kaido’s son Yamato’s motive is. However, the two get in a fight. Taking Luffy’s punishing attacks, Yamato remembers someone he fought against in the past.
100.TitleJapanese: 敵か? 味方か? ルフィとヤマト

101.TitleEnglish: Desire to Be Oden! Yamato's Dream!
101.SummaryEnglish: The Akazaya members who were on board Law’s Polar Tang finally reach Onigashima and see someone who they didn’t expect. Kaido’s son Yamato starts telling his story to Luffy, shares his passion, and reveals what’s behind his mask!
101.TitleJapanese: おでんになりたい ヤマトの思い

102.TitleEnglish: Explosive?! The Handcuffs that Shackle Yamato's Freedom!
102.SummaryEnglish: At the back entrance of Onigashima, the Akazaya members try to get inside the gate, but they’re blocked by their former colleague Kanjuro. Meanwhile, as Kaido’s son Yamato shows Luffy the handcuffs that have restricted his freedom for years, they hear Kaido making a speech on his grand plan.
102.TitleJapanese: 爆発！？ヤマトの自由を縛る錠！

103.TitleEnglish: The Akazaya Face-Off! Kikunojo vs. Kanjuro!
103.SummaryEnglish: Kaido’s plan to obtain the great treasure infuriates Orochi, but his unexpected violent move silences everyone. Meanwhile at the back entrance of Onigashima, Kikunojo squares off against Kanjuro and gets into an emotional fight with her former colleague.
103.TitleJapanese: 赤鞘一騎打ち 菊之丞VSカン十郎

104.SummaryEnglish: The Akazaya members start charging towards Kaido from the back of Onigashima. Meanwhile, at the Performance Floor, Kaido closes in on Momonosuke shivering in terror and asks him the ultimate question which will determine his fate.
104.TitleJapanese: 討入り！受け継ぐおでんの意思

105.TitleEnglish: Onigashima in Tumult! Luffy's All-Out War Begins!
105.SummaryEnglish: The Akazaya members deliver a crushing blow to Kaido. Luffy and Yamato try to back them up, but Ulti stands in their way and Big Mom spots Luffy. Meanwhile, Nami and Carrot free themselves from their enemies and move on to take back Zeus!
105.TitleJapanese: 鬼ヶ島激動 ルフィ全面戦争開始

106.TitleEnglish: The Battle Under the Moon! The Berserker, Sulong the Moon Lion!
106.SummaryEnglish: The Animal Kingdom Pirates gasp with surprise to see thousands of samurai warriors coming into the castle. In his dragon form, Kaido goes outside to fight the Akazaya members under the moon. However, the Akazaya members have secret weapons to use against him.
106.TitleJapanese: 月下の戦い狂戦士 "月の獅子

107.SummaryEnglish: Shinobu tries to rescue the weakened Momonosuke but is found by King and attacked. On the other hand, Nami takes back Zeus from Big Mom and runs away but loses him again and gets chased by Zeus who is ordered to kill to her by Big Mom.
107.TitleJapanese: ゼウスの反逆！？ナミ絶体絶命！

108.TitleEnglish: I'll Protect You! Yamato Meets Momonosuke!
108.SummaryEnglish: Franky faces Big Mom with the help of Robin and Jimbei, but the Numbers come interrupting their battle. One of them holds Brachio Tank with Usopp and Chopper inside in his hand. Meanwhile, Yamato, the self-proclaimed Oden, finally meets his son Momonosuke.
108.TitleJapanese: 君を守る 邂逅ヤマトとモモの助

109.TitleEnglish: Overwhelming Strength! The Straw Hats Come Together!
109.SummaryEnglish: As the Minks struggle with a poor hand against the Gifters, Kin’emon tries to assist them, but Dogstorm and Cat Viper stop him and start fighting for the other Minks! Meanwhile, Luffy and Zoro try to get to the rooftop to help Kin’emon and the others, but Queen and King get in their way.
109.TitleJapanese: 圧倒的戦力！麦わらの一味集結

110.TitleEnglish: A Risky Invitation! A Plot to Eliminate Queen!
110.SummaryEnglish: Who’s-Who invites Drake and Hawkins to a plot to kill Queen. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats are facing two large monsters that remind them of the Giant who they once struggled to take down. As Luffy charges towards them, someone unexpected comes in to help.
110.TitleJapanese: 危険な誘い！クイーン抹殺計画

111.TitleEnglish: A New Rivalry! Nami and Ulti!
111.SummaryEnglish: Drake vows to fight alongside Luffy, but Zoro becomes skeptical and challenges him to a fight. Meanwhile, Usopp’s practical joke pushes Nami into confronting Ulti, who is infuriated since her brother got attacked.
111.TitleJapanese: 新たな因縁！ナミとうるティ！

112.TitleEnglish: A Heroic Blade! Akazaya vs. Kaido, Again Once More!
112.SummaryEnglish: Queen uses a new version of the Plague Bullets which will turn the samurai into ogre-like monsters. Meanwhile, the Minks keep pushing the fight against the Gifters and drive Jack into a corner. However, Kaido stands up for his subordinate.
112.TitleJapanese: 悲壮の刃！赤鞘VSカイドウ再び

113.TitleEnglish: An Inherited Technique! Unleashing Oden's Secret Swordplay!
113.SummaryEnglish: While Luffy is hurrying to the rooftop and Yamato is trying to catch up to Momonosuke to protect him, the Akazaya members finally face off against Kaido. Hearing Kaido jeering at them for being weak, the samurai retainers attack him relentlessly, remembering the day Oden told them to master his sword skill.
113.TitleJapanese: 受け継ぎし技 炸裂おでんの秘剣

114.TitleEnglish: The Power of Ice Oni! A New Version of the Plague Rounds!
114.SummaryEnglish: Queen, the Lead Performer, blazes away at samurai on the Performance Floor with the special version of the Plague Rounds, which turns them into hideous ogres that corner Zoro and Drake. Meanwhile, Luffy and Sanji, who are on their way to the rooftop, run into another Headliner with a special ability.
114.TitleJapanese: 氷鬼の威力！新たな疫災弾

115.TitleEnglish: I Won't Forgive Him! Chopper's Determination!
115.SummaryEnglish: King orders his subordinates to go after Momonosuke. Shinobu tries to protect him, but they are cornered by one of the strong Lead Performers from the Animal Kingdom Pirates. Meanwhile, seeing people suffering from Queen’s Plague Rounds, Chopper is determined to save everyone.
115.TitleJapanese: 許さねェ! チョッパーの決意!

116.SummaryEnglish: Yamato fights Sasaki and the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division to protect Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Zoro tries to get rid of the Gifters who have turned into Ice Oni, but Queen starts a horrible game which involves the antibody for the virus.
116.TitleJapanese: ゾロの追撃! 氷鬼in鬼ゴッコ

117.SummaryEnglish: Ulti and Page One of the Tobi Roppo chase Nami and Usopp, after being infuriated by their attack as well as Luffy’s declaration of becoming the King of the Pirates. Cornered, Nami gives in and Ulti pushes her to say the unthinkable.
117.TitleJapanese: ナミ降伏！？うるティの猛頭突き

118.TitleEnglish: Sasaki's Onslaught! Armored Division vs. Yamato!
118.SummaryEnglish: Carrot and Wanda step in to help Marco, who is cornered by Big Mom and Perospero. In the meantime, Yamato fights a fierce battle against the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division led by Sasaki, while protecting Shinobu and Momonosuke
118.TitleJapanese: ササキの猛攻 装甲部隊VSヤマト

119.TitleEnglish: Eliminate the Ice Oni! Chopper's Fire Trick!
119.SummaryEnglish: Zoro and Drake continue to chase Apoo to get the antibody against Ice Oni, while Chopper is trying to figure out how to fight the virus. In the castle, Luffy, Jimbei, and Sanji are climbing up the stairs to reach the rooftop where the Akazaya members’ tough battle against Kaido rages on.
119.TitleJapanese: 氷鬼を破れ チョッパーの火策！

120.TitleEnglish: It's Not Okay! The Spider lures Sanji!
120.SummaryEnglish: Sanji hears a woman’s scream for help and dashes into the room the scream can be heard from. However, it’s a trap set up by Black Maria of the Tobi Roppo. Meanwhile, Luffy and Jimbei who are trying to reach the rooftop get help from the unexpected.
120.TitleJapanese: よかねエよ！！サンジを誘う蜘蛛

121.TitleEnglish: A Turnaround Move! The Flames of Marco the Phoenix!
