121.SummaryEnglish: While Kaido begins the New Onigashima Project, Marco appears in front of Chopper and the others, who are struggling with Ice Oni. The members of the Tobi Roppo continue to give the Straw Hats a hard time while their former member helps Zoro.
121.TitleJapanese: 逆転の一手！不死鳥マルコの炎
121.SummaryJapanese: 浮上を続ける鬼ヶ島。そのライブフロアでは、マルコが加勢に現れたことに海賊たちがおののいていた。氷鬼に感染し苦しむ人々に、マルコは青い炎を浴びせる。

122.TitleEnglish: Yamato's Past! The Man Who Came for an Emperor of the Sea!
122.SummaryEnglish: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu that he once confronted a man, who came to Onigashima looking to get Kaido’s head. His name was Ace. The two of them engaged in a fierce battle that eventually turned into an important friendship.
122.TitleJapanese: ヤマトの過去 四皇の首を狙う男

123.TitleEnglish: Marco's Tears! The Bond of the Whitebeard Pirates!
123.SummaryEnglish: The formidable Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates stand in Zoro’s way as he tries to get to the rooftop. Marco sees his late comrade in Zoro’s determination and tries to pave the way for him.
123.TitleJapanese: マルコの涙！白ひげ海賊団の絆!

124.TitleEnglish: Straw Hat Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the King of the Pirates!
124.SummaryEnglish: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu about how Ace gave him hope for the future. Meanwhile, Luffy and the other allied pirates from the Worst Generation make it to the rooftop to finally face off against Kaido and Big Mom.
124.TitleJapanese: 麦わらのルフィ 海賊王になる男

125.TitleEnglish: The Battle of the Monsters! The Three Stubborn Captains!
125.SummaryEnglish: Luffy’s strong attack reminds Kaido of all the strong ones he’s ever met. On the other hand, Luffy, Law, and Kid keep quarreling amongst themselves. Meanwhile, Sanji is caught and interrogated by Black Maria in what he calls “heaven.”
125.TitleJapanese: 怪物決戦！意地張りあう三船長

126.TitleEnglish: A Barrage of Powerful Techniques! The Fierce Attacks of the Worst Generation!
126.SummaryEnglish: Luffy, Law, Kid, Zoro, and Killer keep landing hard blows against Kaido in tandem despite the arguing. However, when Big Mom steps in and unleashes powerful lightning strikes, the tide turns for all except one of the rookies.
126.TitleJapanese: 大技連発！最悪の世代の猛攻！
126.SummaryJapanese: カイドウとの戦いが続くルフィ、キッド、ロー、ゾロ、キラー。ルフィはギア４、キッドは磁気魔人、ローはタクトで大量の岩塊を動かし、カイドウに襲いかかる。

127.TitleEnglish: Kaido Laughs! The Emperors of the Sea vs. the New Generation!
127.SummaryEnglish: Luffy pummels Kaido with his well-trained Kong Gatling and delivers a final blow using all his strength. Big Mom tries to fight back, but Law gets in her way and Kid and Killer also try to finish Kaido off.
127.TitleJapanese: 笑うカイドウ! 四皇VS新世代!

128.TitleEnglish: Otama's Secret Plan! Operation Kibi Dango!
128.SummaryEnglish: After watching the Straw Hats’ departure to Onigashima, Tama wondered if there was anything she could do to help the Straw Hats and the samurai. Now that she’s here on Onigashima, it’s time to execute her powerful plan – Operation Kibi Dango!
128.TitleJapanese: お玉の秘策! きびだんご大作戦

129.TitleEnglish: Sanji's Scream! An SOS Echoes over the Island!
129.SummaryEnglish: Sanji is captured and tortured by the merciless Black Maria. She names the terms of his release: to turn over one of his crewmates. He hesitates but has no other option. After much distress, he makes a move that surprises everyone.
129.TitleJapanese: サンジ絶叫！島中に響くSOS

130.SummaryEnglish: Robin bursts in to rescue Sanji along with Brook, and faces Black Maria, who is trying to keep Sanji as her pet. Meanwhile, Yamato, Momonosuke, and Shinobu are spotted hiding by the enemy, and they find themselves on the run again.
130.TitleJapanese: スパンク炸裂！サンジの女難！

131.TitleEnglish: No Regrets! Luffy and Boss, a Master-Disciple Bond!
131.SummaryEnglish: Chopper works hard to make the cure for Ice Oni, even though he is turning into one himself. Meanwhile, the infected Boss Hyogoro the Flower regains his youth and fights fiercely to protect Chopper and the others.
131.TitleJapanese: 悔いなし ルフィと親分師弟の絆

132.SummaryEnglish: Seeing everyone turning into Ice Oni, there is nothing that the samurai warriors can do other than grieve. However, it wasn’t just them who were devastated by Queen’s raging virus. When their desperation and frustration peak, they hear a hopeful voice.
132.TitleJapanese: 準備OK！チョパファージ霧砲

133.TitleEnglish: Oden Appears! The Confused Hearts of the Red Scabbards!
133.SummaryEnglish: That unparalleled laugh! The Akazaya regain hope upon witnessing Oden's return. They failed in their attempt to take down Kaido, but after twenty years, they team up with Oden again to finish the job!
133.TitleJapanese: おでん現る！揺れる赤鞘の心！

134.TitleEnglish: The Worst Generation Gets Wiped Out?! The Emperors' Deadly Attack!
134.SummaryEnglish: The Akazaya members run to save Momonosuke, but an unexpected contender stands in their way. Queen gets infuriated after Chopper ruined his plot and goes after him. Meanwhile, on the rooftop, Kaido and Big Mom unleashes a combination attack on Luffy and the others.
134.TitleJapanese: 最悪の世代全滅！？四皇の大技！

135.TitleEnglish: The Supernovas Strike Back! The Mission to Tear Apart the Emperors!
135.SummaryEnglish: The iron hammer of the Conqueror will lead the people to hell. Badly injured, Luffy and the others know what to do with Kaido. To start a new era, they will do something desperate that paralyzes the Emperors.
135.TitleJapanese: 超新星反撃！四皇分解作戦

136.TitleEnglish: Protect Luffy! Zoro and Law's Sword Technique!
136.SummaryEnglish: Even after Big Mom was pushed off of the island, Zoro and the others keep fighting the exhausting battle against Kaido. When Kaido tries to beat up the unconscious Luffy, Zoro launches an all-out attack at the risk of his life.
136.TitleJapanese: ルフィを守れ！ゾロとローの剣技

137.TitleEnglish: Surpass the Emperor of the Sea! Luffy Strikes Back with an Iron Fist!
137.SummaryEnglish: Luffy remembers how he was advised by his friends, how he was saved by his comrades, and the frustrations of being defeated. As Kaido mocks him to his face, the Color of the Supreme King Haki gushes out and they clash again.
137.TitleJapanese: 四皇を超えろ ルフィ反撃の鉄拳

138.TitleEnglish: A Faint Memory! Luffy and Red-Haired's Daughter Uta!
138.SummaryEnglish: A young Luffy who has been dreaming about getting out of Windmill Village one day to accomplish something great meets a young girl named Uta who came along with Shanks and the Red-Hair Pirates calling herself the musician of the pirate group.
138.TitleJapanese: 淡い記憶 ルフィと赤髪の娘ウタ

139.TitleEnglish: A Pledge for the New Genesis! Luffy and Uta!
139.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and Uta run across Windmill Village, compete with each other, and share their dreams with each other. They also pledge to build a new genesis for everyone to live happily. However, one day, the unexpected happens.
139.TitleJapanese: 新時代の誓い！ルフィとウタ

140.TitleEnglish: Nami Screams! A Deadly Death Race!
140.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and Kaido who have both infused themselves with the Color of the Supreme King clash! Meanwhile, Nami, Usopp, and Tama are running from Page One to get to the Performance Floor, but they bump into another tough enemy, Big Mom.
140.TitleJapanese: ナミ絶叫 絶体絶命デスレース！

141.TitleEnglish: The Dawn of the Land of Wano! The All-Out Battle Heats Up!
141.SummaryEnglish: Kin’emon and the Akazaya members are rushing to help Momonosuke and everyone else while Yamato leaves Momonosuke and Shinobu in a hide-out to lure away their enemies. At the same time, Ulti tries to avenge her brother against Big Mom.
141.TitleJapanese: ワノ国の夜明け 全面対決激化！

142.TitleEnglish: The Conclusion! Luffy, Accelerating Fist of the Supreme King!
142.SummaryEnglish: Sanji is forced to run with Zoro on his shoulder. Meanwhile, Nami bravely stands up against Ulti and Big Mom. On the rooftop, the intense battle between Luffy and Kaido finally comes to an end.
142.TitleJapanese: 決着！ルフィ加速する覇王の拳

143.TitleEnglish: Luffy Defeated! The Straw Hat Crew's Predicament?!
143.SummaryEnglish: Kaidou's destructive power knocked Luffy down along with his King Haki! The ferocious attacks from the senior officers gradually put the Straw Hats' gang against the wall! After the Captain's fall, is there still hope in Wano Country? Or just despair?!
143.TitleJapanese: ルフィ敗北！麦わらの一味窮地！？

144.TitleEnglish: The Beasts Trampled! The End of the Kozuki Family!
144.SummaryEnglish: While the Straw Hats and their allies are all having a hard time, they are shocked by the news that Luffy lost to Kaido. At the same time, Kanjuro closes in on Momonosuke to destroy the Kozuki lineage.
144.TitleJapanese: 百獣蹂躙！光月家の終焉！

145.TitleEnglish: Fight Against the Dark Night! The Commander-in-Chief of the Land of Wano Sounds Off!
145.SummaryEnglish: Like all the other samurai, Chopper is discouraged by the news of Luffy’s loss and Queen doesn’t miss the chance to finish him off! Meanwhile, Kin’emon fights for his life to save Momonosuke and that motivates Momonosuke to rise up!
145.TitleJapanese: 闇夜に抗え ワノ国総大将吠える

146.TitleEnglish: Believe in Luffy! The Alliance's Counterattack Begins!
146.SummaryEnglish: The samurai hold out on the battlefield without Luffy. Kid is in front of Big Mom. Law's fighting spirit is immense. When those determinations come together in the face of adversity, a new power is born that will shatter the status quo.
146.TitleJapanese: ルフィを信じろ！同盟反撃開始！

147.TitleEnglish: Nami's Special Attack! Otama's Biggest Deadly One!
147.SummaryEnglish: Nami strikes a thunder blast to clear the way to the stage on the Performance Floor. However, the elite corps of the Gifters show up to crush their inferior opponents. Upset but unbroken, Otama stands up to give a command.
147.TitleJapanese: ナミ必殺！お玉決死の大一番！

148.TitleEnglish: Sudden Increase of Allies! The Straw Hats Strike Back!
148.SummaryEnglish: Hearing Otama’s command, the Gifters side with the samurai and upset the Tobi Roppo and others! Chopper starts to take care of Zoro while suffering from the side effect of the enhanced Rumble Ball. Meanwhile, Jimbei gets stunned by Who’s-Who’s story.
148.TitleJapanese: 味方激増！麦わらの一味逆襲！

149.TitleEnglish: A Helmsman's Pride - An Angry Jimbei!
149.SummaryEnglish: Who’s-Who expresses fierce resentment toward Luffy and Jimbei fights back out of his loyalty to Luffy. As Who’s-Who asks Jimbei a question, he tramples on the dignity of the Fish-Men and that sparks Jimbei’s outrage.
149.TitleJapanese: 操舵手の誇り 怒りのジンベエ！

150.TitleEnglish: Great Battle of Monsters! Yamato and Franky
150.SummaryEnglish: To cut ties with Kaido, Yamato unleashes his true power. Meanwhile, Queen repeatedly attacks Sanji with his power as a cyborg, and Sasaki in his Man-Beast Form launches tricky attacks on Franky and drives him into a corner.
150.TitleJapanese: 怪獣大決戦！ヤマトとフランキー

151.TitleEnglish: The Predator's Trap - Black Maria's Seduction
151.SummaryEnglish: Kaido tries to convince Yamato to become the Shogun of the Land of Wano and rule the country with the special power he obtained by accident. Meanwhile, Saul, Professor Clover, and Robin’s mother Olvia suddenly appear in front of her.
151.TitleJapanese: 捕食者の罠 ブラックマリアの誘惑

152.TitleEnglish: Slash the Nightmare - Brook's Sword of Ice!
152.SummaryEnglish: In the dense mist, Brook is surprised to see his old friends, the Rumbar Pirates and Laboon. They reminisce about the old days and play music together, however, they suddenly attack Brook.
152.TitleJapanese: 悪夢を斬る ブルックの氷の抜刀！

153.SummaryEnglish: Black Maria torments Robin both physically and spiritually. As she burns in hellfire, Robin remembers the people who gave her a hard time and the people who supported her, and she as Demon Child shows what she is really capable of.
153.TitleJapanese: クラッチ！悪魔の化身ロビン！

154.TitleEnglish: A Spell! Kid and Zoro Facing Threats!
154.SummaryEnglish: Killer is shocked to find out who Hawkins’ straw doll he slashed represents. Meanwhile, Sanji who is in a hard battle against Queen and King sees enemy brutes going after the injured Zoro, and no one else is there to save him.
154.TitleJapanese: 呪縛！迫る脅威 キッドとゾロ！

155.TitleEnglish: A High-Stakes Battle! Both Wings Take the Field!
155.SummaryEnglish: Zoro gets back on his feet and along with Sanji, confronts King and Queen, the Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates. Watching Zoro fight, Hyogoro and Kawamatsu remember someone from way back.
155.TitleJapanese: 一か八かの大勝負！両翼出陣！

156.TitleEnglish: Ascend to the Dawn! A Pink Dragon Gets Agitated
156.SummaryEnglish: Dogstorm confronts his sworn enemy who destroyed his country. Meanwhile, Cat Viper faces Perospero who is responsible for Pedro’s death. At Tokage Port, Momonosuke roars with his determined eyes.
156.TitleJapanese: 夜明けへと昇れ！桃色の龍猛る

157.TitleEnglish: For the Future! Yamato and the Great Swordsmen's Pledge
157.SummaryEnglish: The battle between Kaidou and Yamato gets intense. Backed into a corner, Yamato remembers three great swordsmen who he met when he was a child. Their stunning choice for the future of the Land of Wano encourages Yamato.
157.TitleJapanese: 未来へ！ヤマトと大剣豪の誓い

158.TitleEnglish: Luffy Soars! Revenge Against the Beasts
158.SummaryEnglish: Luffy amps up the reluctant Momonosuke, who is afraid of heights, in his giant pink dragon form, to fly and take him to Onigashima in the sky. Meanwhile, Yamato, in a hard battle against Kaido, vows to survive until Luffy returns.
158.TitleJapanese: ルフィ飛翔！百獣へのリベンジ

159.TitleEnglish: Two Dragons Face Off! Momonosuke's Determination!
159.SummaryEnglish: Momonosuke faces Kaido once again trembling in fear. However, with Luffy’s encouragement, he bravely steps up and shows his dragon fangs remembering what he had to go through because of Kaido.
159.TitleJapanese: 双龍相搏つ！モモの助の覚悟！

160.TitleEnglish: A Legend All Over Again! Luffy's Fist Roars in the Sky
160.SummaryEnglish: Yamato helps Momonosuke conquer his fear of flying and the two take on the most important task of saving Onigashima. Meanwhile, Luffy and Kaidou clash which parts the heavens. The clear skies help Inuarashi and Nekomamushi finally defeat their foes.
160.TitleJapanese: 伝説の再来！天に轟くルフィの拳

161.TitleEnglish: The Situation Has Grown Tense! The End of Onigashima!
161.SummaryEnglish: Realizing Onigashima’s impending threat, imperiling everyone’s life, Yamato and Momonosuke launch a secret operation. Meanwhile, Sanji and Zoro are both in a deadly battle against Queen and King.
161.TitleJapanese: 風雲急を告げる！鬼ヶ島の末路！

162.TitleEnglish: Sanji's Mutation - The Two Arms in Crisis!
162.SummaryEnglish: Queen’s unforeseen move stuns everyone on the Performance Floor. And then, he goes on to utilize another special technique which can break every bone in Sanji’s body. On the verge of a crisis, Sanji feels something strange again.
162.TitleJapanese: サンジの異変 両翼黄色信号！

163.TitleEnglish: Death to Your Partner! Killer's Deadly Gamble!
163.SummaryEnglish: Killer tries to figure out how to fight against Hawkins whose power enables him to transfer damage against him to Kid. Kid is dying not knowing where his damage is coming from. Killer takes a chance with Kid’s life on the line.
163.TitleJapanese: 相棒に死を！キラー決死の大博打

164.TitleEnglish: A Shadowy Figure Pulls the Strings! Onigashima in Flames!
164.SummaryEnglish: Sanji still wonders what is happening to his body as he receives attacks. Meanwhile, the dying Kin’emon hears an unexpected voice calling for the also dying Kanjuro. Through the Smail, the voice of Orochi tries to stir up Kanjuro to make him perform one last time.
164.TitleJapanese: 闇の者の暗躍！鬼ヶ島炎上

165.TitleEnglish: Strike Back! Law and Kid's Counterattack Alliance
165.SummaryEnglish: Law and Kid are having a tough battle against a formidable Emperor of the Sea, Big Mom. However, when they decide to work collaboratively and use their awakened Devil Fruit powers, they see the possibility of taking down the old generation.
165.TitleJapanese: 逆襲！ローとキッドの反撃同盟

166.TitleEnglish: For Luffy - Sanji and Zoro's Oath
166.SummaryEnglish: Sanji is tormented by the idea of becoming a cruel Germa warrior like his siblings and torn between being strong or being humane as he is now. When he makes up his mind, he asks Zoro the ultimate favor.
166.TitleJapanese: ルフィの為に サンジとゾロの誓い

167.TitleEnglish: The Onslaught of Kazenbo - Orochi's Evil Clutches Close In
167.SummaryEnglish: The Fiery Monk, materialization of the destructive ire of the Kurozumi clan, continues his deadly descent into the castle and instills fear in both the ranks of Kaido's pirates and those of the samurai. Orochi, all excited by the scenes of panic, suddenly hears a sound that brings back happy memories.
167.TitleJapanese: 火前坊襲来 迫るオロチの魔の手

168.TitleEnglish: Zoro Faces Adversity - A Monster! King the Wildfire
168.SummaryEnglish: Zoro is facing a hard fight against King who seems invincible. Even one of Zoro’s deadliest attacks doesn’t leave a scratch on him. On top of that, one of Zoro’s swords goes out of control and gets in his way.
168.TitleJapanese: 逆境のゾロ 怪物! 火災のキング

169.TitleEnglish: Secrets of Enma! The Cursed Sword Entrusted to Zoro
169.SummaryEnglish: Zoro still can’t gain control of Enma which keeps extracting his Haki. Backed into a corner by the formidable King, Zoro remembers the encounter with an old man in his hometown when he was a child.
169.TitleJapanese: 閻魔の秘密！ゾロに託されし妖刀

170.TitleEnglish: The Strike of an Ifrit! Sanji vs. Queen
170.SummaryEnglish: Queen’s formidable attacks remind Sanji of his family. Annoyed by Queen’s provocations, Sanji remembers a young woman mysteriously getting hurt in front of him and realizes what happened at that time, which lights a fire within him.
170.TitleJapanese: 魔神の一撃！サンジVSクイーン

171.TitleEnglish: The Three-Sword Style of the Supreme King! Zoro vs. King
171.SummaryEnglish: Zoro tries to figure out a way to damage King. Meanwhile, King remembers when he first met his captain Kaido and declares that his captain is the one to become the King of the Pirates, which leads Zoro to set his swords alight with hellfire.
171.TitleJapanese: 閻王三刀流 ゾロVSキング

172.TitleEnglish: Luffy is on the Move! A Turning Point to a New Era!
172.SummaryEnglish: Usopp finds Kin’emon’s upper body and the heavily wounded Kiku. However, they are surrounded by the Gifters and can’t find a way out. Seeing the samurai giving up hope, Usopp remembers his determination.
172.TitleJapanese: ルフィ躍動！新時代の分岐点！

173.TitleEnglish: Drunken Dragon Bagua! A Lawless Dragon Approaches Luffy
173.SummaryEnglish: In the Flower Capital, the Fire Festival is about to end. On Onigashima, the battle between Luffy and Kaido is getting even more intense. However, Kaido who is excited about having a strong opponent starts drinking too much.
173.TitleJapanese: 酒龍八卦！ルフィに迫る無法の龍

174.TitleEnglish: The Destruction of the Alliance?! Fire up, the Will of the New Generation!
174.SummaryEnglish: Determined to counter the fury of Big Mom, who is about to join Kaido, Kidd and Law must face the imperial omnipotence while in the underground arsenal, Yamato leads the assault against the fiery monk. As the death knell tolls for the final battles, will the rebellion emerge victorious?
174.TitleJapanese: 同盟壊滅!? 燃えろ新世代の意志！

175.TitleEnglish: Here Comes Main Act! Powerful Techniques of Shockwave and Magnetism
175.SummaryEnglish: Big Mom’s strong life force discourages Law and Kid. Law tells Kid that he only has enough energy for one last strike. However, a monster Big Mom summons puts the two in even more of a bind.
175.TitleJapanese: 大トリ来る！波動と磁気の大技

176.TitleEnglish: To the New Era! Settled! The Determination of the Brats
176.SummaryEnglish: Kid’s all-out deadly attack and Law’s tactical action leave Big Mom in the lurch. Then she remembers what Roger said in the past and wonders if the treasure he mentioned is out there after all.
176.TitleJapanese: 新時代へ！決着！ガキ共の覚悟

177.TitleEnglish: Moon Princess Echoes! Wano Country's Final Phase!
177.SummaryEnglish: Kaido mourns Big Mom’s defeat and remembers the day he met her for the first time. Meanwhile, backed into a corner, Orochi sees the true nature of Komurasaki, the woman he loves, and trembles with fear.
177.TitleJapanese: 月姫が響く！ワノ国最終局面！

178.TitleEnglish: There Is Only One Winner - Luffy vs. Kaido
178.SummaryEnglish: On orders from the Five Elders, the CP-0 agent Guernica tries to get to Luffy, but Drake stands in his way. Meanwhile, Luffy who only has very little energy left uses his last Gear Four to emancipate the people of the Land of Wano from Kaido.
178.TitleJapanese: 勝者はひとり ルフィVSカイドウ

179.TitleEnglish: Luffy Defeated?! The Determination of the Left Behind
179.SummaryEnglish: The main battle of the dome ends unexpectedly. Running out of a serious fight, a furious Kaido confronts the injured samurai. Now that 20 years of hope have crumbled before his eyes, can they find a way out of hell?
179.TitleJapanese: ルフィ敗北！？残された者の覚悟

180.SummaryEnglish: As Luffy’s heart pounds in a funny way, the Five Elders reveal the secret behind the Gum-Gum Fruit. Meanwhile, Orochi tries to convince Komurasaki to escape with him, but when he sees Kanjuro, he makes a malicious decision.
180.TitleJapanese: ルフィの最高地点 到達 !〝ギア5〟
180.SummaryJapanese: 敗北したルフィだったが、リズミカルな鼓動とともに意識が戻ってくる。ルフィは大笑いをはじめ、復活をとげると、この事態に五老星たちはふるえていた。

181.TitleEnglish: The Ridiculous Power! Gear 5 in Full Play
181.SummaryEnglish: With his newfound power, Luffy is able to overwhelm Kaidou to the point where he greatly enjoys the battle, shocking Kaidou and his allies alike with his immense power.
181.TitleJapanese: ふざけた能力! 躍動するギア５

182.TitleEnglish: No Way Out! A Hellish Scene on Onigashima
182.SummaryEnglish: As Luffy and Kaidou continue their battle, Raizo and Jinbe utilize their plan to put out the fire that has spread throughout Onigashima. Meanwhile, Yamato warns Momonosuke of the danger Onigashima will face if he does not act soon to create new flame clouds to keep it from crashing into the Flower Capital.
182.TitleJapanese: 逃げ場なし！地獄絵図の鬼ヶ島

183.TitleEnglish: I Trust Momo - Luffy's Final Powerful Technique!
183.SummaryEnglish: As Momonosuke struggles to create his own flame clouds, Luffy continues to fight Kaidou. As the Samurai realize what would happen to Onigashima if Luffy won, Orochi is freed from the Seastone Nail and attempts to murder Hiyori. After hearing the voices of the people, Luffy prepares his final attack.
183.TitleJapanese: モモを信じる ルフィ最後の大技！

184.TitleEnglish: 20 Years' Worth of Prayers! Take Back the Land of Wano!
184.SummaryEnglish: As Momonosuke is doubting he could move Onigashima out of the way of Luffy's final attack, both he and Kaidou prepare their final strike. As the cruelty of the past twenty years on Wano Country is shown, the alliance prays for Luffy's victory. As Denjiro saves Hiyori from Orochi, the people at the Fire Festival reveal their true wish with their Sky Lanterns.
184.TitleJapanese: 二十年の祈り！ワノ国を取り戻せ

185.SummaryEnglish: Kaido remembers how he was treated unfairly in the past and how he believes the world should be. While his friends struggle to survive on Onigashima, Luffy is asked by Kaido to picture his ideal world as he throws a destructive punch.

186.TitleEnglish: The Curtain Falls! The Winner, Straw Hat Luffy!
186.SummaryEnglish: The samurai and the Straw Hats shout for joy as they hear that Luffy defeated Kaido. Meanwhile, Momonosuke informs Zunesha of a major decision that he made. However, when Yamato calls on the Animal Kingdom Pirates to stop fighting, the earth trembles.
186.TitleJapanese: 幕引き！勝者 麦わらのルフィ！

187.TitleEnglish: He Returns! The Shogun of Wano Country, Kozuki Momonosuke
187.SummaryEnglish: The people of the Flower Capital get flustered when Kin’emon and the other Akazaya samurai who were supposed to be dead appear from the smoke. However, the last one who walks out of the smoke, and what he says, confuses the people even more.
187.TitleJapanese: 帰還！ワノ国将軍 光月モモの助

188.TitleEnglish: The Morning Comes! Luffy and the Others Rest!
188.SummaryEnglish: The Land of Wano is in a celebratory mood now that the years of tyranny are over. However, Yamato is holding back his hunger alone until Hiyori arrives with the news he was waiting for. Meanwhile, some unknown figure approaches the Land of Wano.
188.TitleJapanese: 朝が来た！ルフィ達の休息！

189.TitleEnglish: The Festival Banquet! New Emperors of the Sea!
189.SummaryEnglish: Tenguyama reveals his true identity as Sukiyaki to Robin and confirms Wano's secret. The new Emperors of the Sea are declared, as Ryokugyu heads after Luffy.
189.TitleJapanese: 祝祭の宴！新しき海の皇帝達！

190.TitleEnglish: The World Will Burn! The Onslaught of a Marine Admiral!
190.SummaryEnglish: As the Navy Admiral Ryokugyu comes to strike the Flower Capital, the Akazaya samurai notice and try to stop him, but his Woods-Woods Fruit power overwhelms them. Meanwhile, another formidable, yet friendly, guest approaches the Land of Wano
190.TitleJapanese: 世界が燃える！海軍大将襲来！

191.TitleEnglish: The Coming of the New Era! The Red-Haired's Imperial Rage
191.SummaryEnglish: Sukiyaki shows Robin and Law the Road Ponyglyph and tells them more about Wano's history. Momonosuke decides to face Ryokugyu to prove he could defend Wano and successfully uses the Bolo Breath attack. Shanks releases a tremendous burst of Haoshoku Haki to force the admiral to retreat.
191.TitleJapanese: 新時代到来！赤髪の皇帝の怒り

192.TitleEnglish: The World That Moves On! A New Organization, Cross Guild
192.SummaryEnglish: The party is over, and at the castle in the capital of flowers, Kinemon and Kiku are worried about Raizo and Shinobu, who have become thinner due to the battle with the Midori Cow. Meanwhile, Momonosuke and Hiyori come to know Hitetsu's true identity.
192.TitleJapanese: 動く世界! 新組織クロスギルド
192.SummaryJapanese: 宴は終わり、花の都の城では緑牛との戦いで痩せ細った雷ぞうとしのぶを錦えもんと菊が心配していた。一方、モモの助と日和は飛徹の正体を知ることになる。

193.TitleEnglish: Time to Depart - Wano Country and the Straw Hats
193.SummaryEnglish: An untold story from before the Straw Hats’ departure. Luffy visits the ruins of Oden Castle where Oden’s grave once was and Zoro visits Yasuie’s grave where he meets Hiyori. Later, Luffy and Tama eat red-bean soup together for the last time and share their feelings with each other.
193.TitleJapanese: 旅立ちの時 ワノ国と麦わらの一味

194.TitleEnglish: The Last Curtain! Luffy and Momonosuke's Vow
194.SummaryEnglish: Angered by Luffy's attempt to leave without saying goodbye, Momonosuke rushes with Kin’emon and Yamato to the port from where the Straw Hats are about to leave, thinking back on his days with Luffy.
194.TitleJapanese: 終幕！ルフィとモモの助の誓い

1.TitleEnglish: A New Emperor! Buggy the Genius Jester!
1.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and the other Straw Hats’ new bounties are revealed. Meanwhile, at Emptee Bluffs Island, Crocodile and the greatest swordsman in the world Mihawk, visit Buggy to discuss their newly-established organization, Cross Guild.
1.TitleJapanese: 新皇帝！千両道化のバギー！

2.TitleEnglish: The War on the Island of Women! A Case Involving Koby the Hero
2.SummaryEnglish: Navy Captain Koby comes to the Island of Women to arrest Pirate Empress Hancock with the new Pacifistas. While the Navy and Kuja fighters clash, Blackbeard comes to raid, also targeting　Hancock.
2.TitleJapanese: 女ヶ島の乱！英雄コビーの一件

3.TitleEnglish: Luffy's Dream
3.SummaryEnglish: The three-way struggle between the Navy, the Blackbeard Pirates, and the Kuja Pirates comes to an end when an unexpected figure shows up. On the Sunny, the Straw Hats talk about the recent incidents around the world and Luffy’s words surprise everyone.
3.TitleJapanese: ルフィの夢

4.TitleEnglish: Entering a New Chapter! Luffy and Sabo's Paths!
4.SummaryEnglish: The World Government destroys Lulusia Kingdom before Sabo could divulge information about Imu over the Den Den Mushi. Several days later, the Straw Hat Pirates come across a young girl trapped in a Warm Eddy.
4.TitleJapanese: 新章突入！ルフィとサボの針路！

5.TitleEnglish: A New Island! Future Island Egghead
5.SummaryEnglish: Luffy and Chopper fall into the rough cold sea along with the mysterious girl. Jimbei tries to help them but another attack comes from the unknown creature. Meanwhile, the Sunny is hit by torpedoes and the rest of the Straw Hats are thrown into the sea, too.
5.TitleJapanese: 新しい島！未来島エッグヘッド

6.TitleEnglish: Brimming with the Future! An Adventure on the Island of Science!
6.SummaryEnglish: A young girl who came out of the big robot names herself Dr. Vegapunk and it surprises Franky and the rest of the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Luffy’s group gets to the surface of the island where futuristic buildings stand and unknown giant creatures wander about.
6.TitleJapanese: 未来満載！ 科学の国の冒険！

7.TitleEnglish: Bonney's Lamentation! Darkness Lurking on the Future Island
7.SummaryEnglish: While Luffy and the others are enjoying the futuristic machines of Egghead, someone who resembles Bartholomew Kuma comes after them. When Luffy tries to fight back, Bonney stops him and reveals her shocking relationship with Kuma.
7.TitleJapanese: ボニーの慟哭！未来島に潜む闇

8.TitleEnglish: The Winner Takes All! Law Vs Blackbeard!
8.SummaryEnglish: The Blackbeard Pirates ambushed the Heart Pirates led by Law. The Blackbeard Pirates’ top officers use a variety of formidable Devil Fruit powers and keep pushing the Heart Pirates in order to obtain the copies of the Road Ponegliffs.
8.TitleJapanese: 勝者総取り！ローVS黒ひげ！

9.SummaryEnglish: Bonney changes the ages of Luffy, Chopper, Jinbe, and hers, so that the Pacifista won't recognize them. Meanwhile, Lilith gives the rest of the crew a tour, and they respond enthusiastically, until someone who looks like Jinbe show up.
9.TitleJapanese: 深まる謎！エッグヘッド研究層
9.SummaryJapanese: くまの姿をしたパシフィスタが、ルフィ、ジンベエ、チョッパー、ボニーを捕らえようと襲い掛かって来た。攻撃を繰り返すパシフィスタに、ジンベエは反撃を試みる。

10.TitleEnglish: The Brain of a Genius - Six Vegapunks!
10.SummaryEnglish: Science offers endless possibilities! Research has already begun! An inscrutable quest for knowledge that confuses the straw hats. Good and evil. Wisdom and greed. Reason and instinct. Talented minds that come from all directions and are now reunited!
10.TitleJapanese: 天才の頭脳 6人のベガパンク！

11.TitleEnglish: A Forbidden Piece of History! A Theory Concerning a Kingdom
11.SummaryEnglish: Vegapunk Shaka shares with Robin and the others his theory about an ancient kingdom and the 100-Year Void. He even says that he visited Ohara after its destruction. Meanwhile, Luffy and Chopper try to activate the giant robot and something surprising happens.
11.TitleJapanese: 禁じられた歴史！ある王国の仮説
11.SummaryJapanese: ベガパンクのサテライトの一人・シャカによって明かされる、歴史から抹消された王国の真実。それはロビンの故郷であるオハラが滅びた理由とも関係していた。

12.TitleEnglish: The Will of Ohara! The Inherited Research
12.SummaryEnglish: Shaka reveals the secret behind the foundation of the Revolutionary Army and how the relationship between Vegapunk and Dragon affected it. Meanwhile, Vegapunk explains to Luffy and the others about his special power and how his clones work. The wish for the future conveyed by the Ohara scholars moves the Straw Hats.
12.TitleJapanese: オハラの意志！受け継がれる研究

13.TitleEnglish: The Eccentric Dream of a Genius!
13.SummaryEnglish: The scientific power of 900 years ago is revealed in front of the iron giant. Vegapunk is fascinated by the energy of an antique and brims with ideas and ideals. What awaits the future you dream of?
13.TitleJapanese: 奇想天外！天才が想い描く夢！

14.TitleEnglish: Preparations for Interception! Rob Lucci Strikes!
14.SummaryEnglish: CP-0 led by Rob Lucci makes a forced landing at Egghead and people on the Fabriophase are plunged into confusion while Shaka and the others prepare to fight back on the Labophase. The enraged Atlas stands up to defend the peace of the island.
14.TitleJapanese: 迎撃準備！ロブ・ルッチ襲来！
14.SummaryJapanese: エッグヘッド近海では、サイファーポールの船とシービーストウェポン達が対峙していた。撤収を要請するピタゴラスに埒が明かないとみたルッチは強襲を決行する。

15.TitleEnglish: Powers on a Different Level! Luffy Vs Lucci!
15.SummaryEnglish: Luffy transforms into the Warrior of Liberation as Rob Lucci also shows his awakened Devil Fruit form. As the two clash, Vegapunk reveals the shocking truth of the Gum-Gum Fruit and his eye-opening theory on Devil Fruits.
15.TitleJapanese: 異次元の力！ルフィVSルッチ！

16.TitleEnglish: The Strongest Form of Humanity! The Seraphim's Powers!
16.SummaryEnglish: Vegapunk describes how he managed to grant the Seraphim Devil Fruit powers, which surprises Franky and the others. Meanwhile, Luffy is still facing Lucci in his savage, awakened form, but the rocket to the Labophase is about to leave.
16.TitleJapanese: 最強の人類！セラフィムの能力！

17.TitleEnglish: Sinister Schemes! The Operation to Escape Egghead
17.SummaryEnglish: Vegapunk asks the Straw Hats to take him on board their ship which makes Franky and Usopp happy but annoys Nami. Lucci orders his troops to block off all Vegapunk’s escape routes and looks to invade the heavily-secured Labophase.
17.TitleJapanese: 蠢く陰謀！エッグヘッド脱出作戦

18.TitleEnglish: Turn Back My Father! Bonney's Futile Wish!
18.SummaryEnglish: CP-0 enters the Labophase and starts attacking the Thousand Sunny as soon as they find it. Luffy reunites with Nami and the others but finds out that Vegapunk is missing. Meanwhile, Bonney is pressing Vegapunk to change back her father Kuma.
18.TitleJapanese: 父を戻せ！儚きボニーの願い！

19.TitleEnglish: A Desperate Situation! The Seraphim's All-out Attack!
19.SummaryEnglish: The Seraphim come following CP-0 to the Labophase, pitting Zoro and Brook against the seven of them. Sanji, Franky, Edison, and Lilith leave the lab to fight them, but the Seraphim launch a full-scale attack on the lab.
19.TitleJapanese: 絶体絶命！セラフィム総攻撃！

20.TitleEnglish: A Beautiful Act of Treason! The Spy, Stussy
20.SummaryEnglish: Stussy shows her intentions and attacks Lucci. Her unexpected smile confuses the Straw Hats. As the Seraphim continue to attack, the true objective of the mysterious Stussy is revealed.
20.TitleJapanese: 麗しき反逆！内通者ステューシー

21.SummaryEnglish: About to escape from Egghead, Dr. Vegapunk, key to the mission, suddenly and inexplicably disappears. Where could he have gone if the lab was closed? The Straw Hat crew starts searching for the genius scientist.
21.TitleJapanese: 異常発生！探せ！Dr.ベガパンク

22.TitleEnglish: A Shudder! The Evil Hand Creeping Up on the Laboratory
22.SummaryEnglish: Bonney witnesses her father Bartholomew Kuma’s painful memories. Meanwhile at the lab, Shaka notices that their communications and surveillance cameras are being cut off by somebody.
22.TitleJapanese: 戦慄！研究所へ忍び寄る魔の手

23.SummaryEnglish: The Seraphim suddenly attack the Straw Hats. They even ignore orders from the satellites. Who is giving them commands? While suspicion falls on Vegapunk's satellites, the Seraphim's attacks corner Luffy and his crew.
23.TitleJapanese: 理解不能！セラフィムの反逆！

24.TitleEnglish: A Difficult Decision! An Unusual Alliance!
24.SummaryEnglish: Lucci and Kaku from CP-0, who came to Egghead with a mission to eliminate the seven Vegapunks, ask Luffy and Zoro to uncuff them so they can fight alongside them against the Seraphim, but Luffy and Zoro are reluctant to do so.
24.TitleJapanese: 苦渋の決断！異色の共闘戦線！

25.TitleEnglish: Survive! Deadly Combat with the Strongest Form of Humanity!
25.SummaryEnglish: Zoro realizes that the Seraphim have King's Lunarian abilities. Sanji arrives to help Nami and Brook against S-Shark, and S-Snake partially turns Franky to stone while completely petrifying Usopp and Lilith. Meanwhile, Shaka tracks down Dr. Vegapunk while following a lead, only to be killed by a mysterious assassin.
25.TitleJapanese: 生き残れ！最強の人類との死闘

26.TitleEnglish: The Return Of Ohara! The Mastermind's Ambition!
26.SummaryEnglish: Stussy and Sentomaru discuss how big the threat that closes in on Egghead is as Luffy and the others keep fighting the uncontrollable Seraphim. Meanwhile, in an underground lab, someone approaches Vegapunk, who is being held captive.
26.TitleJapanese: オハラの再来！黒幕の野望！

27.SummaryEnglish: Kid gives his crew a pep talk before the battle with Shanks. And Shanks also prepares for the battle but learns how his own subordinates do as they like to protect their beloved boss. Finally, Kid has his Damned Punk ready to shoot.
27.TitleJapanese: 激突！シャンクスVSユースタス・キッド

28.TitleEnglish: Run, Koby! A Desperate Escape Strategy!
28.SummaryEnglish: Held at the Pirate Island of Beehive, Koby gets a chance to be free but decides to become a decoy to liberate slaves on the island. Pirates from all over the island come after him because of the big bounty on his head.
28.TitleJapanese: 走れコビー！決死の脱出作戦！

29.TitleEnglish: For the Beloved Pupil - The Fist of Vice Admiral Garp!
29.SummaryEnglish: A huge warship comes flying towards the pirate island of Hachinosu, and Vice Admiral Garp launches a devastating attack to rescue his student Corby. Corby almost reaches the ship while Frigate Captain Hibari runs alongside him.
29.TitleJapanese: 愛弟子のため ガープ中将の拳骨！

30.SummaryEnglish: Kuzan faces Garp, who has come to rescue Koby. Why did he join Blackbeard after leaving the Navy? Once Garp's prized student, Kuzan is now a pirate, challenging his former mentor
30.TitleJapanese: 海軍驚愕！元海軍本部大将クザン

31.TitleEnglish: Let's Go Get It! Buggy's Big Declaration
31.SummaryEnglish: Sengoku, the former Admiral of the Fleet, and Great Adviser Tsuru discuss the murder of Vice Admiral T-Bone and concerns about Cross Guild. Meanwhile, Buggy gives a passionate speech to Crocodile, Mihawk, and his crew.
31.TitleJapanese: 取りに行こうぜ！バギーの大宣言

32.TitleEnglish: Sabo Returns - The Shocking Truth to Be Told!
32.SummaryEnglish: Sabo returns to Kamabakka Queendom and starts recounting what happened at the Holy Land Mary Geoise. A month ago, during the Reverie, he and the captains of the Revolutionary Army raided the Land of Gods and Sabo witnessed Bartholomew Kuma being the Celestial Dragons’ slave.
32.TitleJapanese: サボの帰還 語られる衝撃の真実！

33.TitleEnglish: The Sacred Land In An Uproar! Sai And Leo's Powerful Strike!
33.SummaryEnglish: In the Holy Land Mary Geoise during the Reverie, Sabo runs into Bartholomew Kuma’s daughter Bonney. Meanwhile, King Cobra of the Kingdom of Alabasta begins asking the Five Elders questions that trouble them.
33.TitleJapanese: 聖地騒然！サイとレオ渾身の一撃！

34.TitleEnglish: The Entrusted Message! King Cobra's Resolve
34.SummaryEnglish: King Cobra is surprised by seeing someone sitting on the Empty Throne and by learning about the truth of the world. When he is subject to a deadly attack, Sabo cuts in to save him. The injured king entrusts Sabo with a message.
34.TitleJapanese: 託された伝言[メッセージ]! コブラ王の覚悟

35.TitleEnglish: The World Is Shaken! The Ruler's Judgment and the Five Elders' Actions!
35.SummaryEnglish: Sabo, Vivi and Wapol, as well as Bonney all escape from Mary Geoise by stowing away on different ships. Imu decides to test the Mother Flame on Lulusia Kingdom. Sabo finishes his story with what happened at Lulusia Kingdom when it was destroyed. Ivankov suspects that the Imu Sabo met might be one of the First Twenty. Meanwhile at Mary Geoise, Mjosgard is executed by Garling for his earlier actions of defending Otohime's family.
35.TitleJapanese: 揺らぐ世界! 支配者の審判と五老星の始動!

36.TitleEnglish: Garp and Kuzan - A Master and a Pupil's Beliefs Clash
36.SummaryEnglish: At the Pirate Island of Beehive, Vice Admiral Garp, who came to rescue the kidnapped Koby, deals with an overwhelming number of pirates alone. As he and his fellow Navy soldiers try to escape the island, Kuzan, the former Navy admiral, stands in their way.
36.TitleJapanese: ガープとクザン 衝突する師弟の正義

37.SummaryEnglish: Avalo Pizarro, who merged with the Pirate Island, reaches his giant hand to crush the Navy ship with many soldiers and civilians on board. The wounded Garp gives orders to Koby, Helmeppo, and Prince Grus, and delivers a powerful blow to save the ship.
37.TitleJapanese: 最後の教え！受け継がれた拳骨（インパクト）

38.TitleEnglish: The World Shakes! The Straw Hats` Hostage Situation
38.SummaryEnglish: As the news spreads throughout the world of Garp's disappearance and the hostage situation regarding Dr. Vegapunk, the repercussions of Lulusia Kingdom's destruction affects the entire world. As Admiral Kizaru's forces surround Egghead, York contacts them to reveal she had been caught by the Straw Hat Pirates.
38.TitleJapanese: 世界震撼! 麦わらの一味立てこもり事件

39.TitleEnglish: Completely Surrounded! The Operation to Escape Egghead
39.SummaryEnglish: In the Labophase on Egghead, which is completely surrounded by the Navy, Luffy and the others devise a plan to escape the island. However, the Frontier Dome, the laser defense system, cannot be deactivated without York’s secret passcode.
39.TitleJapanese: 全面包囲! エッグヘッド脱出作戦

40.TitleEnglish: A Clash of Two Men's Determination! Kizaru and Sentomaru
40.SummaryEnglish: Navy Admiral Kizaru finally makes landfall on Egghead and Sentomaru, Vegapunk’s bodyguard, stands in his way. The two men who were once close now clash violently. Meanwhile, Luffy and the others try their best to move the Sunny to the back side of the island to escape.
40.TitleJapanese: ぶつかる男の覚悟！黄猿と戦桃丸

41.TitleEnglish: Looming Despair! Admiral Kizaru's Depressing Mission
41.SummaryEnglish: Kuma finally reaches Mary Geoise and keeps advancing even without free will or mind. But Fleet Admiral Akainu stands in his way. On Egghead, Kizaru enters the Labophase and delivers a powerful kick to Luffy who tries to stop him.
41.TitleJapanese: 迫る絶望！大将黄猿の憂鬱な任務

42.TitleEnglish: Luffy vs. Kizaru! A Fierce Kaleidoscopic Battle
42.SummaryEnglish: A bizarre battle between Luffy and Kizaru heats up. Meanwhile, in the Fabiriophase, Bonney is all alone and being chased by the Navy soldiers. Dr. Vegapunk sees this and can’t help but leave the Labophase to rescue her, risking his life.
42.TitleJapanese: ルフィVS黄猿！変幻自在の大激戦

43.TitleEnglish: The Nightmare Strikes - Godhead of Science & Defense, St. Saturn
43.SummaryEnglish: Vegapunk successfully wrests back the Pacifistas from the Navy, but another party soon gains control of them. At the same time, Luffy, Zoro, and the others sense an unearthly presence just as a pentagram suddenly appears on Egghead.
43.TitleJapanese: 悪夢襲来　科学防衛武神サターン聖

44.TitleEnglish: Kuma's Past - Better Off Dead in This World
44.SummaryEnglish: Bonney gets captured by St. Saturn, whose enigmatic power keeps Sanji and Franky from saving her. In St. Saturn's clenched fist, she recalls the memories of her father, Kuma. 47 years ago, Kuma was born to a father of a race on the verge of extinction.
44.TitleJapanese: くまの過去　死んだ方がいい世界

45.TitleEnglish: A History Erased! God Valley of Despair
45.SummaryEnglish: The human hunt begins and the Celestial Dragons start chasing locals of God Valley and slaves for prizes. Ivankov and Ginny share with Kuma and the others their surprising plan to survive the game. Meanwhile, ships full of infamous pirates start arriving on the island one after another.
45.TitleJapanese: 消された歴史！絶望のゴッドバレー

46.TitleEnglish: A Fleeting Moment of Happiness - Kumachi and Ginny
46.SummaryEnglish: Kuma and Ginny live peacefully in the Sorbet Kingdom eight years after the God Valley Incident. However, their new king initiates a policy of enslaving the poor. Kuma tries to free those who were captured but ends up being imprisoned himself. But a familiar face comes to rescue him.
46.TitleJapanese: ひとときの幸せ くまちーとジニー
46.SummaryJapanese: ゴッドバレー事件より8年。南の海・ソルベ王国の教会では、17歳になったくまが牧師として老人達の痛みを取り除く日々を送っていた。

47.TitleEnglish: A Pledge to Ginny - Kuma Becomes a Father
47.SummaryEnglish: Two years after Ginny’s abduction, the Revolutionary Army suddenly receives a call from her.
47.TitleJapanese: ジニーへの誓い　父となったくま

48.TitleEnglish: To Save His Daughter - Kuma the Timid Pacifist
48.SummaryEnglish: By fighting off King Bekori who is supported by the World Government, Kuma is put on the wanted list and decides to travel around the world in search of a cure for Bonney's disease. He reunites with Dragon and learns about the Government’s eccentric scientist who might be able to cure Bonney.
48.TitleJapanese: 娘（ボニー）を救え 気弱な“平和主義（パシフィスタ）”くま
48.SummaryJapanese: ソルベ王国国王ベコリの暴政にくまが立ち上がる。のちに「ソルベ王国の一人革命」と呼ばれるこの事件後、国民達からの願いを断りきれず、くまは国王となった。

49.TitleEnglish: Cruel Fate - Kuma's Decision as a Father
49.SummaryEnglish: Taking advantage of Kuma’s love for his daughter Bonney, the World Government imposes three harsh conditions on him in exchange for her treatment. Kuma agrees to them and Bonney’s treatment starts at Laboratory 8 in tandem with the clone development with which Kuma agrees to cooperate.
49.TitleJapanese: 非情なる運命　父くまの決断
49.SummaryJapanese: くまとベガパンクのやりとりを知ったサターン聖は、ボニーの病気を治す代わりとして、さらに3つの条件を突きつける。それは到底受け入れがたいものだった。

50.TitleEnglish: To the Sea Where My Father Is! The Future Bonney Chooses
50.SummaryEnglish: Bonney has been waiting for a letter from her father Kuma who promised to write to her. But with no letters in sight, she turns nine and one day realizes her disease is cured. She then decides to go out to sea to search for her father.
50.TitleJapanese: 父のいる海へ！ポニーが選ぶ未来
50.SummaryJapanese: 3年前“東の海”ゴア王国コルボ山で特訓に励むルフィを見つめるくま。くまの脳裏を「子は親の弱点だ」というドラゴンの声がよぎる。

51.SummaryEnglish: Bonney sails out to sea in search of her father and rises to prominence. At the same time, Luffy makes his name by defeating the Arlong Pirates and declaring war against the World Government. Watching his actions, Kuma begins to hold a certain belief.

52.TitleEnglish: I'm Sorry, Dad - Bonney's Tears and Kuma's Fist
52.SummaryEnglish: The present day on Egghead, Bonney is caught in St. Saturn’s grasp, knowing he is responsible for her father’s transformation into a cyborg. However, Saturn reveals an even more shocking truth that throws Bonney into despair.
52.TitleJapanese: ごめんね、お父さん ボニーの涙とくまの拳
52.SummaryJapanese: くまの記憶のすべてを見たボニーは、ベガパンクを誤解していたこと、そして悲劇の元凶がサターン聖であることを知る。

53.TitleEnglish: Thank You, Dad - Bonney and Kuma's Warm Embrace
53.SummaryEnglish: Kuma, battered and without free will, approaches Bonney. Overcome with emotion, she tells him she saw all his memories and learned everything that he did for her. Watching the scene, Vegapunk wonders what compelled Kuma to come to Egghead.
53.TitleJapanese: ありがとう、お父さん　ポニーとくまの熱く抱擁
53.SummaryJapanese: ボニーの悲痛な叫びに応えるかのように現れたくま。自我を失い、体も限界を迎えているはずのくまだったが、泣きじゃくるボニーのもとへゆっくりと歩みを進める。

54.TitleEnglish: Destroy Egghead - The Buster Call Is Invoked
54.SummaryEnglish: As an order comes down to evacuate the island in preparation for bombardment, Navy soldiers rush to their ships. Meanwhile, Vegapunk pleads with Saturn to halt the attack, arguing how vital the island is for the future of humanity, but Saturn refuses to listen.
54.TitleJapanese: 未来島(エッグヘッド)を破壊せよ　バスターコール発動
54.SummaryJapanese: 世界政府に害を成すと認定され、サターン聖によってバスターコールが発動。エッグヘッドは人類の未来だと訴えるベガパンクだったが、サターン聖は一蹴する。

55.TitleEnglish: An Admired Hero - The Warrior of Liberation Who Saves Bonney
55.SummaryEnglish: Vegapunk reveals the secret he alone has been keeping regarding the Pacifistas. Meanwhile, Bonney, her back against the wall, hears a familiar rhythm. It’s the rhythm that her father taught her along with the legend of the hero he admired.
55.TitleJapanese: 憧れのヒーロー ボニーを救う解放の戦士

56.TitleEnglish: Reliable Reinforcements! Dorry and Brogy Arrive!
56.SummaryEnglish: The Giant Pirate Crew led by Dorry and Brogy arrive at Egghead, which deeply moves Usopp and the others. Zoro keeps fighting Rob Lucci and the Pacifistas continues to torment the Navy while Luffy shows Bonney how to throw a real punch.
56.TitleJapanese: 頼もしき援軍! ドリーとブロギー到着!

57.SummaryEnglish: Caribou begs Augur and Devon to let him meet Blackbeard. An order is given to the Navy vice admirals to kill Jewelry Bonney at all costs in order to take back control over the Pacifistas. Sanji flees with the injured Vegapunk while Luffy holds St. Saturn back.
57.TitleJapanese: 応答せよ, 世界 ベガパンクのメッセージ
57.SummaryJapanese: 黒ひげ海賊団のカタリーナ・デボン、ヴァン・オーガーに接触した濡れ髪のカリブー。その目的は、古代兵器に関する情報を手土産に、黒ひげに接近することだった。

58.TitleEnglish: Vegapunk's Secret Plan - A Tense Worldwide Broadcast
58.SummaryEnglish: Suddenly, Vegapunk’s broadcast begins and the whole world is taken by surprise. As everyone rushes to set up Video Transponder Snails and screens to watch it, the Five Elders grow concerned and discuss countermeasures.
58.TitleJapanese: ベガパンクの秘策 緊迫の全世界配信

59.TitleEnglish: The Worst Nightmare - The Five Elders Come Together
59.SummaryEnglish: Just like when St. Saturn emerged on Egghead, black lightning strikes and pentagrams appear again. The Pacifistas are rendered immobile by an unknown shadow. Meanwhile, as the time for the Straw Hats to evacuate the island is drawing near, the fight between Zoro and Lucci intensifies.
59.TitleJapanese: 最凶の悪夢 「五老星」集結
